To find out more, visit the SheClimbs website.

We have members all over the Bay Area and beyond; many of our events are local gym-based meetups, but we have taken climbing trips to many parts of California and to other states as well.

Disclaimer: This is not an instructional group or a guide service.  We exist simply to facilitate organizing meeting times and places for independent women climbers to meet each other. Therefore every climber assumes responsibility for her own safety. By joining the meetup and participating in any events you agree that neither the group nor the event organizer is liable for any injury, and you join at your own will and risk.

name: Bay Area Women's Networking Alliance
description:
Bay Area Women's Networking Alliance is for women with different industries who would like to practice their networking skills and to network with both women  and men of purpose and action.

We are dedicated to host fun, social and networking and dance events in a friendly, relaxed and quality environment.

Our mission is also to assist women entrepreneurs, start-ups and established companies to achieve better success in their business through networking and socializing with other professionals.


I am looking forward to meeting you soon!


Brandi Madison

Organizer

name: Roseville "YA" (Young Adult) Lovers
description: This group is for adult women (over 21) who love young adult (or "YA") media of all types. Whether you love books, movies, or television shows, this group is for you!!

name: Activities and Sports for the Awesomely Mediocre - ASAM!
description:
Who Are We?  Awesome.

ASAM (pronounced, "awesome") is not just your average meetup group.  ASAM is intended to be a member-run group, not one of those top-down groups where one organizer decides everything. In other words, the group will have only as many activities as you, the members, collectively suggest and organize. The more you pitch in, the more recreation choices you will have.   

We have found that the most amazing people are attracted to the name, "Awesomely Mediocre." People who have a sense of humor about themselves are just more fun to be around, plain and simple!  If you seek competition, then this Meetup group is not for you.

                   Got any Examples of Activities or Sports I Can Attend and/or Organize?  Yup!


Our activities include:

- Bubble Ball Soccer

- Flag Football

- Themed kickball events

- Trivia Nights

- Board Game Nights

- Capture The Flag

- Softball

- Volleyball

Those are just a few examples.  We meet at bars, we include BBQ's and Potlucks, we go to the lakes and rivers!

Some of our event organizers do charge a nominal fee for their events. 

Join our Facebook group, "ASAM is Awesome!" in order to give your input to the organizers and to find out what activities/sports are being planned.

name: SWaNK Meetup for "Single Women and No Kids" in the Bay Area
description:
Are you an unmarried woman who doesn't have any children? If so, guess what? You're a SWaNK! You can even be in an relationship, and still be a SWaNK as long as you're not married. And we welcome you to join our Meetup Group for events and gatherings that will include entertainment, support, friendship, professional development, fun with SWaNKees (Men and women who are interested in meeting SWaNKs) and other stimulating, thought-provoking and SWaNKy events.

We are strong, we are curious, we are independent, we are SWaNKs. "We may be on our own, but we are not alone!"

Please join us and be a part of the SWaNK Evolution! Learn more here...http://www.SWaNKEvolution.com

name: Gals Gone Fun
description: 'Gals Gone Fun' welcomes women of all ages, whether single or married, regardless of age, ethnicity, or background. The Gals are buddies, pals, friends and chums. Our goal is to socialize, while doing activities we enjoy. 'Gals Gone Fun' will enrich your life with the fun activities we share. We love walking while chatting, then sipping coffee to sounds of laughter and conversation . We love getting out into the East Bay Hills, but we are not serious hikers. Together, we laugh and cry at the movies, and we all agree that the meal afterwards tastes yummier with the 'Gals'. We visit museums, Bay Area attractions, coffee houses, and meals out on the town. We attend concerts and plays, host parties, share cooking creations, knit, sew and bead together, volunteer and participate in fundraising events, plus we talk about books we read and TV series we are watching. Many 'Gals Gone Fun' are devoted to their dogs, so most 'Gal' walks welcome your buddy to our group, 'Dogs Gone Fun'. None of this would be fun without you and your event ideas! So please suggest activities or become a 'Gal' organizer so you can set up and lead some wonderful outings. And if you don't know what to do, just propose your idea and our skilled 'Gals' will gladly help you. We appreciate the friendship of a diversity of women. We know that together we are stronger and happier. Most activities are in central Contra Costa or Alameda County, but we love to explore and stretch our wings, so don't be surprised when we post fun opportunities in SF, Monterey, or anywhere in between.

name: Healthcare Businesswomen's Association: SF Bay Area Chapter
description: The HBA San Francisco Chapter is the premier organization for women looking to grow their professional network and advance their leadership skills in the dynamic Bay Area! Join us at our fun and exciting events!

name: Ciao Bella Getaway Club Travel for Women
description: Women - just like you - find themselves searching for a travel solution when friends or family, for whatever reason, are unable to travel with them. Or just want to have a fun night out! Faced with this problem, you have two choices: a) stay home OR b) join a group of women who are just as excited about travel as you are. Imagine traveling with a small group of women who share your interest and excitement in a particular destination, where local or international,--the fun, the laughter, the new friendships, and the unforgettable memories! Ciao Bella Getaway Club holds monthly meetings at fun events, spa getaways, and have a calendar packed with something fun and exciting for all women who love to travel and have fun and enriching experiences.

name: Lets Read!  Manteca Ladies Book Club
description:
There's always room for one more book enthusiast in the Manteca Ladies Book Club!

Love to read and love socializing with others who share your passion for books? If this sounds like you, we'd love to have you join us.

Everyone will get to contribute to the book selection process. This allows us to read a wide variety of books that we may not have otherwise picked up in the book store.

We will meet once a month on Tuesday evenings in Manteca.

Come to laugh, share stories and make new friends.

name: Hip Chicks in Midlife
description: You know you're in midlife when you're doing what you've always done but now, you're getting different results. Your body isn't supporting you the way it always has and other things are changing in your life: your kids may be grown or leaving, your parents and/or your spouse may be gone, your employment situation may have changed and you may have outgrown other aspects of your life or lifestyle. Let's get together and meet some new friends, support each other's transitions, reinventions and transformations. We'll get together for a meal, discussions, hikes, parties, outings and especially for support. There will be opportunities to teach, learn, coach and mentor each other.

name: Books & Brunches
description:
A social book club for women ages 20s to 30s who enjoy a good novel and a delicious brunch in the company of fun, witty, inspirational gals.

Each month, we pick a book as a group. We then meet for brunch, hosted either at a member's apartment or a local restaurant, spark up witty conversation about our latest read and and engage in good laughter and friendship. So, let's kick off our heels, dive into a good book, and enjoy a mimosa or two (or three) together!

One of the goals of this club has been to create an intimate atmosphere where members are familiar with each other and there is a sense of continuity in our events. In order to  enable that, we have to keep our group size within a certain number of members. Please be advised that after 3 to 6 months of inactivity in the group, you will be removed to make room for those on our waiting list.

name: My Girlfriends' Garden - Folsom
description: We're a group of women who meet monthly at Wine Gallery/Petra Vineyards Tasting Room for socializing, great conversation, meeting new friends, and wonderful wine (available by the glass). Occasionally we'll have a craft, project or speaker, but there's no agenda or formalities - just great ladies.

name: Women Empowerment & Self-Fulfillment, Bay Area
description: If you deserve a better life style & personal growth, wish to be in control of your life, desire to become significant in other people's life, this is the group for you. We believe that each of us has a deeper purpose in life. It is about time to find your full potential and start your journey for success. We will share with you the secrets of mindset for success. Join, be inspired, empowered, and be enhanced for self-fulfillment.

name: Fun Loving Ladies
description:
*****This group is not accepting new members at this time*****

If you're a fun-loving lady this may be the perfect group for you! We are a group of ladies ranging in age, from 30s-50s! And we are all fun-loving at heart!  We are laid back, open-minded, non-judgmental, full of fun and craziness, and did I mention we like to have FUN!  We do happy hours in the afternoons/evening, dinner and movies, painting and cooking classes, on the weekends maybe brunches, pedicures, shopping, plays, etc. - we do it all! :)  We stay mostly in the Roseville/Rocklin area, but we do venture out now and again, and women from all over the area are welcome to join in on the fun! If you're interested in joining our group please send a request. 

We have a few important things for you to be aware of.  Please read before joining:

Membership dues are a very low $6/year.  This helps cover meetup costs and helps promote more invloved members.

We require that you have a current picture of yourself as well as your first name in your profile.   This makes everyone more comfortable with meeting new people and makes it easier for us to find/recognize first timers.

This group can only be successful with active members.  We want it to be a venue for making new and, hopefully, lasting friendships.  That can only happen with members who participate in our events.  Any member who has not been active with the group for 6 months may be removed, regardless of paid dues. You are always welcome to rejoin if you are able to participate and will only have to repay dues when they come due again.

Our organizers work hard to plan events, which often requires making reservations based on the number of people attending.  Your RSVP is a firm commitment that you will be attending an event.  We know life happens and plans change.  If that happens, please be courteous and change your RSVP or communicate directly with the event host as soon as possible.  If you are unsure whether or not you will be able to attend an event, please hold off on RSVP'ing until you are more certain.  3 no shows and/or last minute cancellations, without communicating with the organizer, will result in removal from the group.  Membership dues will not be refunded if this occurs.   

We don't hold many events in personal residences, but it does happen on occasion.  We require that you attend at least 2 public-place events before attending one that is being held at someone's home.

There are lots of fun things planned and we all look forward to meeting you.  Let's connect and have fun while creating memories and lasting friendships.

name: Enlightened Women Entrepreneurs
description:
This meetup group is designed to empower and inspire women to create businesses that are financially thriving, spiritually satisfying, and serve the people they love to serve. This meetup has a powerful community that allows women to find their authentic voice and learn how to freely express herself with grace and confidence that magnetizes perfect clients and flowing abundance.

Our movement is for women who are ready to get support and be empowered to do business in a way that is fun and inspiring while making a big difference in the world.

We are looking for women who are ready to step out of their box, take a chance and create a life filled with abundance, prosperity, confidence and love. Who wants to create this success for herself so she can give back to others through love, support and her talents as well as pay it forward through knowledge, experience, and self-expression.

This group is designed to bring heart-centered business women together for networking, support, community, brainstorming, collaborating, and growth to expand this movement of women helping women to thrive together. This group is for women who are looking for something more out of life and more out of being in business.

She may describe herself as a healer, coach, holistic practitioner, consultant, speaker with a desire to do more than business as usual. She wants to make the world a better place through her gifts and offerings. This group is perfect for women who are looking for other amazing women for their inner circle of support. Who think outside the box, wants to see positive change in their own life, in their community and their business.

If you are a woman searching for a greater sense of yourself and know you are destined for big things, then we would love for you to join. You don't have to know how to reach your full potential or greatness - you just have to be willing and know you are destined and deserving of greatness. I created this movement as a reminder to all of us that we as women are all in this "thing" we call life together. No women should feel alone and unsupported in your journey. All women have a purpose and unique gifts to share with the world. We must come together as a strong force and work as a team to build unity, strength, and a space for women to feel empowered, supported and loved so each woman may truly express her uniqueness and step into her complete greatness.


To your success, 


Patti Fagan

name: Women in Data Science, San Francisco
description:
This group is for everyone interested in data science, data analytics, data engineering ... and friendly to women and minorities. This group will provide an environment that promotes innovation, creative thinking and learning. I have started this group to be the melting pot of aspirational and existing data scientists.


Events are open for people who identify as women unless otherwise noted and are always open to trans gender. Men can accompany women and attend events.

name: Confidence for Women Entrepreneurs Community
description:
Are you a woman entrepreneur who knows there is much more to your life than you have been living? Do you dream of making a big impact with your business, but you hold yourself back due to fears and lack of confidence? Do you know you were put on this planet for so much more than you are currently living? You are NOT alone! This group is for women entrepreneurs who have a big calling and are ready to step up and into that calling, to bust through those fears, build your confidence, and thrive. The world needs you and your message, so come be supported, empowered, and let your light shine like the brilliant woman you are. The more confidence you have, the bigger impact you can make, in the world and your bank account.

Watch this video on how Confidence and your income are directly related... https://youtu.be/-vz7J1r41CU

This group is a community. A community of women who are building their confidence, supporting one another in their goals, dreams and aspirations. Come each month as we build relationships with one another, learn how to break through blocks, and transform from caterpillars into beautiful butterflies, so that we can all make a much bigger impact in the world, together.

Join the Confident Woman Community on Facebook at https://www.facebook.com/groups/confidencewomenentrepreneurs

I look forward to connecting with you!

With Purpose and Passion,

Erin Summ

www.erinsumm.com

Grab the FREE Report, 7 Secrets to Lasting Confidence for More Clients and Money in the Bank here... www.erinsumm.com/7Secrets

Join the FREE Stand Up and SHINE Confidence Challenge on Facebook here... https://www.facebook.com/groups/shineconfidencechallenge

Get the Stand Up and SHINE 60-Day Confidence Discovery Journal here... bit.ly/standandshine

name: Mt. Diablo Business Women
description:
Mt. Diablo Business Women is a group of professional business women working in many industries including: banking, finance, interior design,technology, medicine, mental health, fashion, coaching, public relations real estate, skin and body care, website design to name a few. Members consist of both self-employed and corporate businesswomen. We have no limitation to industry or size of the business. We meet the second Wednesday of every month for either lunch or dinner, networking, and a speaker. Our meetings are an opportunity to network and to hear a speaker on business and personal development topics. We warmly welcome business women to our meetings and look forward to meeting you. To register, go to: 

http://www.mtdiablobusinesswomen.org/

name: Gather the Women Nevada County
description:
We are a global sisterhood that connects women through circles.
We create safe spaces to share our true selves.
Meeting in circles, we find our voices, claim our power, and celebrate self-worth, leading to personal and planetary transformation.

More information, and sign-up links for the newsletter can be found at:

www.gatherthewomennc.org

name: Women Leaders and Entrepreneurs
description:
Welcome to our Women Leaders and Entrepreneurs group!

We welcome all visionary women who are looking to find potential cofounders, team members, investors, mentors, but most importantly, life-long friends. 

Connect with like-minded women, bounce off your ideas and get support for your business/projects from other women leaders and entrepreneurs.

Join us!

name: Cameron Park to Placerville Girlfriends
description:
Are you looking for a fun group of women to get together with to have a great time doing fun events, while possibly building lasting friendships? Then this is the group for you! This group costs $10.00 a year for membership dues, preferably paid in cash at any event or by mail to Marylou Sanders, 2360 Sleepy Hollow Dr, Shingle Springs, CA 95682. Please include your name with money so I can match you up.

Though we call ourselves 'Cameron Park to Placerville, we're not exclusive to these areas. We have members from El Dorado Hills, Folsom, Camino & beyond! You can't go wrong with girlfriends & coffee or games, or lunches, or dinners, etc! There's lots to do & see in our wonderful neck of the woods, so lets explore them together.  We can take suggestions from any group member who has an idea for a get-together. We may all be surprised by what comes up!

Please be sure to add a photo of you when you sign up. No flowers, pets or grandbabies please. We need to know what you look like in case of meeting at an outdoor event or in the case of opening our home up to you. Thank you.

name: Sonoma County Connections Forum for Women in Business
description: We are a nonprofit organization that serves women in business through community service & education while providing networking and support for women in business. We meet twice a month, first Wednesday evening Mixer and third Friday morning breakfast. We have great speakers and fantastic networking!

name: Enlightened Women Entrepreneurs
description:
This meetup group is designed to empower and inspire women to create businesses that are financially thriving, spiritually satisfying, and serve the people they love to serve. This meetup has a powerful community that allows women to find their authentic voice and learn how to freely express herself with grace and confidence that magnetizes perfect clients and flowing abundance.

Our movement is for women who are ready to get support and be empowered to do business in a way that is fun and inspiring while making a big difference in the world.

We are looking for women who are ready to step out of their box, take a chance and create a life filled with abundance, prosperity, confidence and love. Who wants to create this success for herself so she can give back to others through love, support and her talents as well as pay it forward through knowledge, experience, and self-expression.

This group is designed to bring heart-centered business women together for networking, support, community, brainstorming, collaborating, and growth to expand this movement of women helping women to thrive together. This group is for women who are looking for something more out of life and more out of being in business.

She may describe herself as a healer, coach, holistic practitioner, consultant, speaker with a desire to do more than business as usual. She wants to make the world a better place through her gifts and offerings. This group is perfect for women who are looking for other amazing women for their inner circle of support. Who think outside the box, wants to see positive change in their own life, in their community and their business.

If you are a woman searching for a greater sense of yourself and know you are destined for big things, then we would love for you to join. You don't have to know how to reach your full potential or greatness - you just have to be willing and know you are destined and deserving of greatness. I created this movement as a reminder to all of us that we as women are all in this "thing" we call life together. No women should feel alone and unsupported in your journey. All women have a purpose and unique gifts to share with the world. We must come together as a strong force and work as a team to build unity, strength, and a space for women to feel empowered, supported and loved so each woman may truly express her uniqueness and step into her complete greatness.


To your success, 


Patti Fagan

name: discoverHER: Santa Cruz Socialites
description:
Our Mission: discoverHER

To build a resource hub for all women across Santa Cruz to discover, inspire & celebrate... together.

Our Story: Building Community

Santa Cruz Socialites: discoverHER.life exists because we saw the need to create a society of women whose network and friendships could naturally cultivate relationships, a place where authentic conversations take place and your guard can be down. Our goal is to spark bonds between women who are unlikely to know each other and plant the seed of community.

Santa Cruz Socialites, now: discoverHER.life , the resource hub for all women across Santa Cruz to discover, inspire & celebrate together. From the Household Director, Stay-at-Home-Mom, the Solopreneur, to the Corporate Executive and the Retiree. With a Women in Business: discoverHER directory, events and resources. We are the community and platform to support you in business and in life.

https://discoverher.life/

name: Brilliant Business Women ~ East Bay SF, CA
description: Brilliant Business Women (BBW) is a group designed to encourage business women to get to know each other on a deeper level to create a strong foundation for networking, referral business and professional development in efforts to support each other.

name: Soroptimists of the San Ramon Valley
description: Soroptimist International is a global volunteer movement working together to transform the lives of women and girls.Our network of around 80,000 club members in 130 countries and territories works at a local, national and international level to educate, empower and enable opportunities for women and girls. This Meetup is for women in the San Ramon Valley area.

name: Women Partnering in Business East Bay
description: Please join us as we collaborate and create dynamic business partnerships between professional women in the San Francisco East Bay region. Our goal is to form business partnerships by sharing and supporting other women business owners and professionals in our community. Our group is not category specific, nor are there monthly attendance requirements. However, we do ask that you come to our events not only to expand your own business but also to help grow the businesses of the other attendees. We will alternate between lunch events and evening happy hours.  At the lunches, there will be time for networking and everyone will have a short time to introduce yourself and your business. The evening events are an informal time to get to know each other and our businesses in a less structured format. Please bring business cards, flyers or any other promotional materials you wish to either event.

name: Davis Women seeking new women friends
description:
I started this in 2015 because my last two friends living in California and Davis moved out of town, and I found myself looking for friends not just to do things with, but also to sometimes have serious conversations about topics of import to our country, our world, our families and to our inner selves. 

This group is not about specific activities, but about activities as a way to interact with other women.  Sometimes this leads to personal friendships outside the group, and sometimes it's just about a get-together with other women.  But EVERY meeting so far has been a GREAT TIME.   We do have lots of brainiacs, but we have plenty of regular people to keep us balanced.  There is a strong contingent of younger women, a good number of women with children in school and number of us are empty nesters. 

This should go without saying, but intolerance and back-biting is absolutely unacceptable.  If you don't like someone, keep it to yourself.  If you don't like an entire group of people, such as Jews or African Americans, then this isn't the right place for you.  You don't have to be a Liberal, but you do have to be willing to take each woman as an individual, and not judge her based on her race, religion, etc. 

This is group is strictly for women who live in Davis, or who work a regular Davis job with a Davis address.  (If you live elsewhere, why not start a group yourself?  It's easy!)

All new members are asked to come to a get together within their first three months, plan a get together within their first three months, or contribute toward the cost of maintaining the group, which I personally pay for out of my (very lean) pocket.

We all look forward to meeting you soon!

Best wishes,

Alex

name: Successful Women of Central Valley Networking Mixers
description:
We are a group of local women dedicated to empowering, inspiring, networking, supporting and assisting women in the Central Valley. We believe in and support the "Whole Woman" recognizing that there are many facets of our lives and many levels to connect with other women in our community. Our desire is to create a welcoming environment where we can all realize our goals personally, professionally, and socially in our community.

www.SWCV.org

name: Women's Empowerment Movement Meetup
description: This is a group dedicated to inspiring and leading women to live in their life purposes, be grounded in their self-worth, and join in raising the consciousness of the planet. Meetings will include inspirational talks, networking, social gathering, support, and all out fun.

name: Business Women's Community, Campbell (AKA Savvy Sassy Women)
description:
Business Women's Community, Campbell (AKA Savvy Sassy Women) is here to encourage business women to get to know each other on a higher level to create a strong foundation for networking, referral business and professional development in efforts to support each other at the same time!!! 

Let's make some connections, improve our business, make new friends and most of all HAVE FUN!!!!!

name: Thriving Women in Business Group
description: This group is for you if you are a positive, ambitious woman entrepreneur who wants to use your business as a way to serve others and you want to massively monetize your mastery in the process. If you know the power of a community of like-minded women, if you run your business with integrity, generosity and a desire to support other women in business, if you believe there is plenty of business for everyone, then this group is for you. This group is hosted by Caterina Rando, founder of the Thriving Women in Business Community. She hosts over 90 days or events and trainings for women in business each year and is a sought-after-speaker and well-regarded mentor to women entrepreneurs who want to catapult their businesses while uplifting others. To find out more about Caterina visit www.caterinarando.com and get your free subscription to Thriving Women in Business Magazine at www.twibc.com.

name: Women & Wine in the Valley Meetup
description: A community of women supporting other professionals, business owners and entrepreneurs. We meet once a month at different (or the same) wine bars, also looking to improve our knowledge of wines....look forward to starting a tradition in wine country!

name: Overwhelmed No More Women's Entrepreneur Club
description:
Overwhelmed No More Women's Entrepreneur Club is an empowering community and sisterhood for women entrepreneurs, wearing many hats, juggling work, life, motherhood, business, relationships, and a never ending To Do List that keeps them up at night. 

Join us for our Womenpreneur Networking Socials and Workshops where you will learn tools to get out of overwhelm, connect with like-minded women to network, make new friends, and connections for your business. You're welcome to promote your business with a raffle prize!

We start the Meetup with a dose of inspiration with original women's poetry from the book, Overwhelmed No More! Love Yourself to Wealth http://alturl.com/magpd, creating a safe environment of support to grow ourselves and our businesses.

After each poetry reading, open networking and connecting is available for women interested in getting to know each other better.

It's always a FUN time and women get a lot from attending our events. Join us if you'd like to get out of overwhelm and you're looking for a dynamic women's group to grow yourself and your business. We're here to support you! =)

For more info., visit www.Janna-Chin.com.

name: Girls in Tech
description: Girls in Tech is a social network enterprise focused on the engagement, education and empowerment of like-minded, professional, intelligent and influential women in technology. As young women with the capacity to inspire, we made it our personal desire and passion to create and sustain an organization that focuses on the collaboration, promotion, growth and success of women in the technology sector.

name: SF Enterprise Sales Forum
description:
The SF Enterprise Sales Forum is a community for B2B sales professionals involved in complex sales cycles.  We provide an open and collaborative environment where you can share ideas, network with peers, and learn actionable insights for sales excellence and professionalism from successful sales practitioners and leaders.  We do this through monthly sales talks that provide an opportunity for professional development and a platform for advancing modern sales techniques.

To find out more about us and when we are hosting future events as well as learn about our global chapters, please follow us at http://enterprisesalesforum.com/.

If you wish to contribute actively to the community either as a sponsor, a speaker, or a volunteer for our events, please reach out to us to discuss at drew@entsales.com.

name: Vacaville "Not so prim and proper" ladies, age 65+.
description: This is a group for women age 65+ who are tired of being alone, who are still energetic, and have lots to offer. A very open minded group of women who like to get together to chat, have coffee, brunch or dinner, share life experiences (we know a lot), have discussions about anything (informal), find fun things to do together. To get out of the house for a while

name: San Mateo Business Referral Networking Meetup
description: The Business Referral Network (BRN) represents a broad-based coalition of businesses throughout the Mid Peninsula area. The BRN Mission is to enhance our businesses by building strong relationships through weekly communication and the exchange of leads, referrals, and contact information. Members of BRN assemble in a weekly forum comprised of a variety of business professionals representing various industries. Through exchange of information our collective efforts are focused on creating business opportunities. We accomplish this by advocating the business of our members. BRN provides a forum for cohesive and dynamic interaction among business professionals focused on networking opportunities that result in prospective customers for your business.

name: The Women's Business Builders Club of Fairfield
description:
The purpose of this meet-up group is to provide networking opportunities for local small businesses. There will be trainings and guest speakers relating to growing your businesses and growing your networks. To keep things fresh & lively we will have different format's each meeting. This group will meet 1st & 3rd Tues & will include lunch will be $17. (includes beverage, tax & tip) 
Members will also be able to introduce themselves and their business. Please feel free to invite other potential members to this group. 

Our goal is to provide an Outstanding professional environment that is conducive to help growing your businesses.

name: Awaken The Goddess Within And Transform Your Health
description:
The purpose of this group is to have a circle of women who are passionate about getting stronger, healthier, and awakening the inner Goddess that is inside each and every one of us.

The organizer of this Meetup is Jen Seregos. She has been in the health industry for over 10 years in the fitness and nutrition space. In 2011, she found out she had a genetic mutation that made her susceptible to cancer and had to have her breasts surgically removed to prevent cancer. Shortly after that, her husband left her and a within 2 years of that, her mom was diagnosed with terminal cancer and lost her battle in 2014.

Jen had hit rock bottom and through this process of loss, grief, and failure, she realized that there was more to being "healthy" than just exercise and eating right. She began to incorporate what she needed in order to have a healthy mental, emotional, and spiritual state as well. <br>

When she discovered the formula to have a complete, holistic, and integrated approach to health, she regained her confidence and her inner Goddess.

Now, her passion is sharing this process with her fellow women!

Join us as we reclaim our power together, get healthy, strong, and ready to take on the world.

<br> <br>

name: EBabes TGIF Meetup
description: About EBabe's: EBabe's is the 1st Friday of each month that gives Lesbian women from all over the Bay Area a chance to be part of a community of women after a long week; See old friends, make new ones, (and more if you are looking!). It's a social event with a community consciousness. EBabes teams up with non-profit/not for profit as well as Lesbian owned business and lesbian artists ...to lend a platform so they can share what services they have to offer as well as ask for what they need. Your hosts: Lynn, Jennifer & DB are at each event to welcome you and make sure that you have a good time! We look forward to seeing you! If you have questions contact Jennifer at 510.529.5147 or email: ebabestgif@gmail.com

name: Weight Loss Picnic
description: This meetup's purpose is to workout by walking in the woods or on the beach and then stop and have a break and snack on weight loss sustaining foods. Let's walk in the woods and talk about weight loss/exercise/health goals while we walk. We encourage each other in whatever our goals may be; weight loss, getting fit, healthier lifestyle etc...Come join us!

name: Wine, Women, and Wealth - San Ramon
description: We are building a community of women who want to have fun while learning to build and protect their wealth and share good wine.

name: Team Women Capitola Business Women Networking Meetup
description: Team Women Capitola is a group of quality business minded women looking to support each other in building and growing successful businesses in our community.

name: WOW! Women of Worth-Christian Women's Social Meetu
description: This is a group for woman of all ages that are wanting to grow and learn from one another, make new friends, share ideas, tips, etc. with each other. We have a variety of activities as we have all ages of women and professions. We have dinners, movie nights, hiking, kayaking, special events and speakers, cooking classes, craft days, and so much more!

name: Renaissance Women's Network
description: This is a group for women entrepreneurs! Join our monthly meet-ups at the centrally located Capital One Cafe every second Wednesday of the month and mingle with women entrepreneurs of various backgrounds and stages. Whether you're someone starting a new business or already in business, this peer networking group is for you. We provide dinner, a featured speaker and facilitated peer support groups in which participants will share their current business struggles and help solve their problems by offering each others networks, experience and advice. A trained facilitator will keep track of your goals and follow up with you at the next meeting.

name: Women Supporting Women Meetup
description:
https://goo.gl/forms/cb14hIenBnrL3uyB2

This group is created for ambitious, goal oriented women and also men who are big on supporting a woman's passion & goals. We welcome women from all walks of life/industries/career levels. We started this group because we are big believers in the quote " You can have everything you want in life if you just help enough people get what they want in life". We will put on events that facilitate an environment in which we can learn from each other and trade tips/skills for success. One woman's success can only help another woman's success, let's build each other up - together!

Below are the different ways to connect with the WSW organizers and members.  Please allow 24-48hours from submission for a response to your request.  If there is a option not brainstormed yet below, please don't hesitate to reach out to us and let us know your thoughts.

Request to be part of a Panel for a WSW event

https://goo.gl/forms/aMFwR1gZdr84bCQu1

Request to be a speaker for a WSW event

https://goo.gl/forms/wkAhHoq434sYXBpI2

Request WSW Promote your event

Request to Sponsor a WSW event

Request to Partner with WSW to create an event

https://goo.gl/forms/cb14hIenBnrL3uyB2

Request to Promote your company at a WSW event

https://goo.gl/forms/Thoobl78FxvEaDU22

name: Silicon Valley Women with Big Dreams
description: Calling all women with Big Dreams! Let's get together to inspire and support each other to go for our Big Dreams while rocking it as moms and/or partners. Let's watch our dreams take flight as our collective wisdom propels us to different heights. Be open to receive one million dollar gems to succeed in all areas of our lives: careers/business, relations, spirituality, and health. Together we can have it all!

name: Dream Priestess(TM) Circle - Bay Area Women
description:
The Dream Priestess(TM) Circle is a women's gathering where you can explore everyday magic. You will awaken and deepen your spiritual gifts (e.g. intuition), step into your spiritual power as a leader, and play with new ways of accessing spiritual guidance.

Whether you're experienced with your spiritual gifts, or just discovering you have them, join us for creative exploration and fun. 

The gatherings are at my home and there's room for about 10 women. 

About Amy Brucker

Amy is a Dream Priestess(TM) with an extensive background in shamanic healing and guidance, energy reading, dreamwork, creative expression, and business coaching. In her work, Amy uses her gifts as an intuitive empath to support strong, successful women who long to integrate their spiritual gifts into the full scope of their daily lives. She offers private mentoring programs as well as the Dream Priestess(TM) Initiation Program. She has a B.A. in art and an M.A. in spirituality, and was ordained as an interfaith minister. 

The Dream Priestess(TM) engages her spiritual power to dream her life into being. She knows that the more connected she is to her intuition, imagination, dreams, and nature, the more easily she can create magic for the benefit of herself and others. 

Personal Note: 

In the 15 years I've been teaching and mentoring, I've met many women who are intuitives, empaths, psychics, mediums, etc., but who keep this part of themselves secret so they can succeed in their careers or retain respect from their family and friends. 

These women often feel like they're leaving half of themselves locked in the closet, and consequently, they feel unfulfilled and alone despite their success. Yet more and more women are tired of hiding out. They're ready to confront their fears and be more open about who they are, and that's where I can help. When my clients work wit me, they begin to trust their gifts in bigger ways. They use their gifts to navigate their lives, relationships, health, businesses or careers. They feel more and more confident in who they are, and as a result, they begin to feel the deep soulful satisfaction that comes from living their true purpose.

To learn more go to www.amybrucker.com

name: Conscious Women Entrepreneurs Network Meetup
description:
Who should join are women in business, professional women, female leaders, women healers and practitioners, coaches, consultants, therapists, who have a holistic or spiritual foundation.

Our Meetup will bring together women who are committed to make a difference in the world and enable them to come connect in a meaningful way to support each other in finding clients, team, and business resources. This is an accelerated networking process, so you will get a lot more accomplished in a shorter time, with more fun and deeper connections.

name: Women's Collective
description: "Women, with all our complexities and versions, we need each other...for the love all good things, no more "I wish I were her" manifestations, affirmations, incantations, chants...it's f-ing up your Chi and messing up your potential badass friend crew"

name: Stockton Self-Improvement Meetup
description:
Vendors | Speakers | Members

FREE SISTERS NETWORK MIXER
We Are #WSNRedHeartReady!!!

Come Out and Gain Valuable Information About Having A Healty Heart!!
WEDNESDAY, JULY 20, 2016 From 6:30 PM - 9:00 PM

We Are WSNRedHeartReady!!!

Come Out and Gain Valuable Information About Having A Healty Heart!!


Wealthy Sister Network is a nationwide organization based on women building generational wealth by being RICH in their mind, body, spirit and relationships.

If you would like to be a SPONSOR or VENDOR for this event please contact Katrina Major via email kmajor3999@aol.com or 209-259-1150.

Let's Talk About Having a Healthy Heart...

name: Unwind! East Bay Women Entrepreneurs
description:
Come Unwind with us!

Unwind! East Bay Women Entrepreneurs is a space for women entrepreneurs and aspiring women entrepreneurs to network and support one another in a casual, fun, and welcoming atmosphere. 

Unwind is a place to come for connection and friendship. We are SO excited and happy to spread the word about your business and to support you! This happens organically in Unwind, so please plan to enjoy yourself, drink delicious wine, loosen up a bit and have fun! Please do not plan to give a sales pitch.

We meet once a month, usually on a Thursday evening from 6:30-8:30 PM, at various "wine-centric" spots around the East Bay (usually Oakland).

name: San Jose Woman's Club
description:
San Jose Woman's Club, serving women and the community since 1894, has an active calendar of events, provides scholarships for local students, funds local and women's charitable organizations, and performs charitable work. We have ten Activity Sections: Antiques , Be a Dear and Donate a Brassiere, Besse Book Group, Bridge, Companion Animal Welfare, Ladies Who Do Lunch, Mahjong, Needle Arts, Walking for Fun and Health, and Women in Leadership and Technology. We also have special events and fundraisers throughout the year. 

Come join us! Events and membership are open to all, not just women. Please note that joining the Meetup does not mean joining the San Jose Woman's Club. Membership only $60 per year, but it's not required to attend. If you are interested in joining San Jose Woman's Club as a member, visit our membership page for more details:  www.sjwomansclub.org/members.html.

name: Silicon Valley - Returning to Work
description:
We are a Meetup group that aims to help job seekers, particularly those who have taken a career break, return to work.


Reentering the workforce can be a challenging process, but we can share the journey with you and ease the path. If you are a technology professional seeking to return to work after a career break, or a career changer, we are here to help you in your search process. Please join us at our Meetups to energize your career through networking.

name: Womens INner Strength : Lean In Group
description: Our mission is about empowering women to tap into their inner strength and derive the confidence to reach their highest potential. We strive to help female leaders, entrepreneurs, innovators and dreamers get that helping hand to make their visions real !!!

name: Give Glow - A community for women
description:
Learn more at Give Glow website

Give Glow is a community for women seeking to grow, lead and own their worth. 

A community for women who wants to find our gifts, wisdom, and worthiness. 

We come together to share our stories; share the gifts and beauty we see in one another. 

We come together to feel more connected, to one another and to the world.


We glow with confidence and light, when we recognize our our gifts, our voice.

We step into our leadership, when we know our power, our worth.

When we own our worth, we show up as the person we are meant to be.

When we own our worth, we give the world what it needs.

name: Beauty pros talking business
description: This meetup puts together beauty professionals and publications (hairstylists, photographers, bbloggers, magazines, muas, models, etc) who want to expand their connections and seek collaborations. Fun and creative events coming soon! ANYONE IS WELCOME TO JOIN US

name: East Bay Business Women's Connection
description:
East Bay Business Women's Connection is a group designed to encourage business women to get to know each other on a deeper level and to create a strong foundation for networking, referral business, and professional development. This group is industry specific so please join us at our next meeting to secure your spot. Each meeting will have a speaker and a 10 minute member spotlight. Please bring your business cards and handouts to share. Lunch is not required but strongly recommended.  The food is good and reasonably priced :-)

It's more than just networking, it's making connections!

name: Women's Mindfulness Group: Sister Sangha
description: The Women's Group has ended. Thanks to all those that have participated over the years.

name: Lesbian Businesswomen (LBW)
description: The purpose of this group is to promote and support lesbian owned businesses within the community. Lesbian Businesswomen would like to reach out to anyone looking to either support or be supported. We will be hosting recurring events where women can showcase their businesses and network among each other. These events will be an amazing foundation to create new connections and to reach out to lesbians in our community. We are excited and hope you will get involved with this amazing group of women!

name: East Bay Women's: Mandala Coloring Circle  ...In A Cafe
description: This is a simple, easy, fun few hours to spend with other women who share a common desire to connect with our sisters and ourselves! And, we get to color(feel free to bring any creative project you can do on a table as long as it is not too distracting) If you have any coloring books with mandalas, flowers, dieties, Goddesses..bring them! I will copy several from my book and we can all chose a picture to color. Please bring something akin to colored pencils, your favorite way to color..I like crayons sometimes too. We will mostly be there in a unstructured way, to have fun, relax, and let the world float away for a few hours:-)

name: Women Rise Up Santa Cruz
description:
Hello Gorgeous Women
Welcome to Women Rise Up!

Where you can give and receive support in a variety of ways. 
(This is a new group that is still evolving, be sure to attend so your voice and presence can be heard and felt)  

This is a place where you get to practice being authentic, true to yourself and present with yourself and your needs. A space where you get to exercise your receiving muscle and stand in your value. An opportunity where you can connect and network with big-hearted, passionate women who have big gifts, a large vision and a common intent to share an shine! 

AND, we as WOMEN, with big things to do in the world, THRIVE with support, boundaries, clear communication, awesome self-care, and an empowering practice that LOVINGLY supports the mind and body to be in alignment with our mission and vision without shaming, judging, and criticizing (which shuts us down and keeps us from forward motion).  

TOGETHER we are stronger!

Most importantly, as a women, we have feelings and emotions...and often our businesses become a place where our greatest healing takes place. 

How do we stay positive and make progress in our business when we are busy processing, feeling and healing?

How do we learn how to know what we want and ASK for it if we don't have a safe place to practice? 

Come be seen, heard and supported, and bring friends that you feel are in alignment to this group.

In gratitude and service, Carla

name: Ladies Who Launch - Silicon Valley/San Jose, CA Area Group
description:
Ladies Who Launch is a women's social and business networking group with an open format and never, never any paid dues being pushed (for services few even want!). First and foremost, we are about building authentic relationships. Only then can we support one another and help each other in business. Let's talk, trade, collaborate, connect, chit chat, commiserate, and have some cocktails while doing it!

Ladies Who Launch:
-Is Inclusive and open-minded to different ideas (If it fits in, post about an event, and suggest or plan an event on my meetup page!).
-Never requires a paid membership (or even offers one for that matter!)
-Is about women in business, referrals, personal development, networking, and fun.
-May have speakers from time to time, may just be social. And everything in between is fine by me!
-Allows other people to schedule events and post, so any existing groups currently running meetings related or unrelated to Savvy are certainly welcome to stay.

Join our Linkedin Group https://www.linkedin.com/groups/13583345

name: Davis Ladies Game Night
description:
Attention Lady Game-Players!

We're getting together to play games. Join us to play: board games, card games, short games, long games, games of all varieties. This group is for local ladies of all ages to hang out, use our brains, make new friends, strategize, problem-solve, laugh, and enjoy board games in a casual setting.  Please bring a new game to teach us or just bring yourself (there are usually plenty of games to choose from).  We hope to meet you at our next game event!  :)

name: Creative Women East Bay
description:
This group is for Creative Women looking to find others like them. We have a wide variety of meetups including potlucks, co-crafting, outings, and more! Any form of creative expression is allowed so please don't be shy! We welcome everyone :) I hope you join us for our next meetup. See you soon!

If you find value in this Meetup and want to help support it, you can make a donation directly through Meetup. Do not feel obligated. This group makes me so happy and seeing your wonderful faces is great for me. However, once a group reaches a certain amount of members, Meetup does charge a fee. Even small donations help. :) 

Have a wonderful day!

name: She Inspires Women's Network
description:
Hello Ladies

My name is Cindy Lee.. I am the host of new meetup called "Exchange clothing and make friends"

We created the Meetup to bring ladies together and create the community that its member care, love and compassionate to each other by clothing exchange and gifting and inspire each other by doing good to the world.

We also want to raise the environmental issue and create the opportunity that we can help reduce the clothing waste and help our member to reuse what they have and save money. Sometimes We have entrepreneur guests who talk about their company and work to inspire our members.

We are located in San Francisco and we host an event once a month right now but eventually, we will host an event in South San Francisco with collaboration from other entrepreneurs.

If you are interested in being a member to our meetup this is the link...

https://www.meetup.com/San-Francisco-Exchange-clothing-and-make-friends-Meetup

and check out our next event.

Kind regards,

Cindy

name: Fertile, Strong and Happy (FSH) Support - Campbell
description:
Women with a desire to increase their emotional resilience and happiness in this stress-filled environment, as well as women going through any kind of fertility challenge, are embraced in this group and allowed a safe place to meet and make buddies with other women in a similar place.
We will talk about what's going on in our lives, and look at mindfulness practice, massage, essential oils, fascia healing, acupuncture, chiropractic, sleep habits, healthy foods, creativity, and many other methods of increasing our F-S-H levels.
We will also occasionally have discussions on the latest assisted reproductive technologies (ART) available, to better understand choices available.

name: SheLeadsHer - Millennial Women Leadership Network
description:
The State of Women in the United States are calling for the next generation of women leaders. Millennial Women, are you up for the challenge?!

LEAD-HER-SHIP: As all great leaders grow and develop, the first person they master is themselves. Leadership is understanding your foundation, understanding yourself, your desires and feeling confident on your path. SheLeadsHer is designed for millennial women to start or continue the process of self reflection, authenticity, and ambition as it relates to your career trajectory. While the state of women reflect less than 20% are in the C Suite and 46% of women are in entry level positions, SheLeadsHer is a network of millennial women who feel a strong desire to change these numbers, starting with herself. This group is private and exclusive for millennial women to network with one another, share best practices on reaching your full potential, finding friends to attend conferences with, voluteer work and many opportunuties to push the limits on developing courage to create change, within ourselves, as it relates to career and leadership. I look forward to meeting you!

Jaemi Serene
Women's Leadership Coach, Speaker & Blogger
www.facebook.com\jaemiserene
www.jaemiserene.com

name: Rock My Finances
description: 3 Secrets of the language of love and money

name: Divorced Mom's Meetup
description: For women who share custody of their children with their XMister. Women who are juggling maintaining a career, raising children and being a co-parent. Place to share information and come together in support of each other. We will try to meet at least once monthly, on Friday evenings or weekends.

name: Young and Passionate in Palo Alto
description: Are you passionate about business, productivity, and networking? Come meet like-minded professionals in the heart of Silicon Valley. This group consists of fun, catered events geared towards young entrepreneurs. Join now to be notified of our first "Mansion Meetup Event"!

name: Networking in the Heart of Silicon Valley
description: There is no better place to network than right in the heart of Silicon Valley. Are you taking advantage of your location and meeting connections that can help your business grow? If not joining this Meetup will get you started!

name: SheLeadsHer-Millennial Women Leadership Network-Palo Alto
description:
The State of Women in the United States are calling for the next generation of women leaders. Millennial Women, are you up for the challenge?! LEAD-HER-SHIP: As all great leaders grow and develop, the first person they master is themselves. Leadership is understanding your foundation, understanding yourself, your desires and feeling confident on your path. 

SheLeadsHer is designed for millennial women to start or continue the process of self reflection, authenticity, and ambition as it relates to your career trajectory. While the state of women reflect less than 20% are in the C Suite and 46% of women are in entry level positions, SheLeadsHer is a network of millennial women who feel a strong desire to change these numbers, starting with herself. 

This group is private and exclusive for millennial women to network with one another, share best practices on reaching your full potential, finding friends to attend conferences with, voluteer work and many opportunuties to push the limits on developing courage to create change, within ourselves, as it relates to career and leadership. I look forward to meeting you!

Jaemi Serene
Women's Leadership Coach, Speaker & Blogger
www.jaemiserene.com

name: Boss Ladies
description: We are inspired by incredible women. Women who are resilient. Women who don't take no for an answer. Women who stand proud and tall for what they believe in, even if they are standing alone. Women who are starting businesses. Women who are raising kids and starting businesses. Women who make this world go round. Women like you, or your mother, daughter, friend, sister.

name: SF Girl Bosses
description:
WHO: Genuine, ambitious women who want to form lasting connections.

WHAT: Brunch, girls night out, concerts, speaker panels, networking events, volunteering, hikes, picnics... The possibilities are endless! We live in one of the most amazing cities in the world - let's explore together. 

WHEN: Just about every week! Events are consistent and high quality. This is because: 

- Attendance is verified and confirmed with each person.

- Venues are attentively chosen.

- We have scheduled events like bi-monthly brunches and wine nights.

- We foster an atmosphere of openness, support and fun.

WHERE: The most happening spots in SF. This is a collaborative group, so feel free to contribute!

WHY: To meet fellow girl bosses, exchange ideas, have meaningful conversations, share projects, inspire each other while having a great time! This makes it easier for you to build relationships and make girlfriends.

Email me @ brenda.t.chen@gmail.com if you'd like to organize a Meetup, have any feedback for me or want to make suggestions for future events!

Join our Facebook Group!

* You must have a profile picture in order to be approved. Thanks so much! *

name: The GUILD: networking for like-minded professional women
description: The GUILD is a networking service for like-minded professional women to help them build stronger connections through 1:1 meetings. In addition, the GUILD plans monthly themed events aimed at a providing our members with the opportunity to gain skills, promote their businesses and organizations, and share best practices. And sometimes we just have fun!

name: Women Who Dine, Drink, and Curse
description:
If you're a woman who is interested in making new friends and you have a relaxed attitude, join us! The plan is to have frequent and varied events so there is always something on the agenda. Dinners, brunch, scenic walks, festivals, happy hour--we'll try to find interesting and fun things to do.

I hate to start out with a rules list but in attending other meet-ups, I think it's important to set expectations. The best Meet Up group I was involved in only allowed 100 members and kept a waitlist of prospects. The administrator set up basic rules at the very beginning. Long lasting friendships resulted from that group and I'd love to see the same thing here. 

So, these are the "rules"

1. If you sign up and are inactive for 2 months, you're automatically removed. If you're going out of town or will be inactive but want to remain involved, just shoot us an email and we'll keep you active.

2. If you RSVP and then are a no show twice, you're removed. 

3. We'll cap the group at 100. Please, if you join, look around and decide this isn't for you, leave the group so there's room for someone else. 

4. The yearly fee for membership is $5.00. It costs $15 per month to keep the group active. Once that is paid for, the remaining fees will be used however the group sees fit--a party or perhaps a holiday donation to a charity. Meet Up no longer allows us to accept fees through the group so we request that you either pay $5 at your first meet up or use PayPal.

5. You are welcome to attend the first event on us, if you want to continue, please pay the fee. If you attend an event and then we don't hear from you, we'll remove you so someone else can join.

6. We won't accept members who don't have a photo of themselves in their bio. We want to be able to recognize you at meet ups. It also cuts down on people who spam huge numbers of groups.

7. We won't accept members who do not live in the area. 

8. We won't accept members who don't have a personal profile picture. We want to be able to recognize you at events and to know you are a real person.

Finally, if you are interested in organizing events and setting up meet-ups, please let us know. It is really helpful to have several active organizers putting in events. It's also a great opportunity to find people who like to do the things you like to do! 

Input is appreciated. If you have suggestions for the group, we want to hear them so don't be shy.

Thank you.

name: Lunch lounge and launch
description:
Women who are interested in creating friendships with other women in the area
At our first meeting we can determine what our interests are

name: Flowering Hope's Hiking for Hope
description:
Do you like to hike with a purpose? Every time your join Hiking for Hope you will be helping to support women and girls!

I will be leading a number of hikes over the next 8 weeks. I am asking for a $10 donation - All proceeds go towards Flowering Hope's Survivor Hikes and our summer education Female Youth Hiking and Health program, which are provided free to participants. You can learn more on our website at www.floweringhope.org.

name: Marin Women at Work
description: This is a networking referral group for female entrepreneurs that want to connect with and support other women in business. If you are interested in meeting dynamic, smart, fun spirited women this is a group for you. Membership is not mandatory to attend our events.

name: San Francisco Women's Empowerment Meetup
description: Hosting events where women role models in career, finance, sprituality, self care, athletics, and wellbeing speak to their experiences. Facilitated group conversation follows. Women find inspiration, support and a nudge towards their dreams.

name: Supergirls SF
description:
Community for curious, active, open women, interested in health and wellness:)

Mission - motivate women to take care of themselves and find a life outside of work.

name: Women getting Social with Wine in Auburn
description: This Group of Women Loves to be Social, and Social with Wine!  We love to meet other Business Professional Women who enjoy Networking, Eating, Drinking, Laughing, and having fun!  Get out and go to Happy Hour, a Paint Party, or a Wine Tasting, maybe go to a Bunco night!  Meet other Women in Auburn who have Energy and would like to meet others over a Pint of Ale or a Glass of Wine!  Enjoy Life, but Enjoy it with others!

name: San Jose WILPF (Women's Intl League for Peace & Freedom)
description: Wilpf San Jose is for anyone who wants to work today for peace and freedom, human rights, women's rights, and more with an organization whose founding goes back to 1915.

name: Concord Women's Business Networking Meetup
description: Professional Woman's Networking Group (PWNG) is starting a new group in Concord-Martinez, which is a business referral group of ladies, whose goal is to help each other grow our business. Each industry will be represented by one woman and we will meet twice a month at B. J.'s at the Sunvalley Mall. The meeting is the first and third Wednesday every month, and our first meeting will be June 21rst, at 8:45 a.m. to socialize/network ... the actual meeting is from 9:00-10:00. We will also be choosing and contributing to a charity, from our social gatherings, raffles, etc. Once you come twice and fill out the application, you will be able to join, if your industry is open. We really want a fun group of woman, who enjoy each other, want to help each other and the community!!

name: Polka Dot Powerhouse Pleasanton, CA
description:
Polka Dot POWERHOUSE s a unique connections group. It is all about posItive relationship building, camaraderie, and encouraging and pushing each other to be our best is all aspect of business and life. There is a huge array of forward thinking, action driven women in Polka Dot POWERHOUSE, we have 59 chapters all over the United States and Canada, and we are starting a chapter in Pleasanton CA. Come join us and be a founding member of this AMAZING Chapter, and let's network together, build our businesses together, and form lasting friendships where we push each other to the next level.

Check out the upcoming events to get more information on attending and becoming a founding member.

name: Mentor Leaders
description: Mentor Leaders seeks to connect people building mentorship programs with experts, coaches, mentors, and each other. We want to take each program and community out of its individual silos for greater knowledge-sharing and better programs. Mentor Leaders is for those who believe in the importance of paying it forward and building safe a community and relationships around learning and growth. Whether you are building an internal mentorship matching program for an ERG within your company, have run a mentorship program for entrepreneurs in your meetup group, or want to build a youth mentorship program for your students. We want to invite you to join this discussion.

name: Walnut Creek Women in Legal Meetup
description: This is a group for women working in any aspect of the legal/legal technology industry to get together in the East Bay. As a relative newby to California I'm looking forward to meeting other women in the area and sharing our experiences.

name: East Bay Endo Sisters
description:
Welcome! I started this group as a support for others experiencing endometriosis and its impact on our physical health, emotional well-being, family, social life, career, and for many of us, our fertility. My vision for this group is to provide in-person and online support for all things endo, as well as a group to have fun with! So, not a support group, but a supportive group!

I am open to rotating in-person hangout locations in order to be inclusive of fellow endo sisters/warrior throughout the Bay Area. If you're new, please send me a message with some cities you're willing to travel to and some good days/times for meetups!

Since endo can cause chronic pain and bad flare-ups, we're understanding if you have to cancel a hangout. Unfortunately that can be life with endo sometimes! If you need to cancel, please be courteous and change your RSVP as soon as possible just so no one is stuck out somewhere by themselves. You can also send a text to the organizer to try to let everyone know. Other than that, welcome and we look forwarding to meeting you!

name: Goddess Queen Getaways
description: A women's retreat to come Slow Dance your body in to rejuvenation and reverence Experience your own natural intuition And release false evidence appearing real. Connect with women and build a sisterhood

name: Women Who Biz
description:
Attention Biz Women!!!

Calling all WOMENFOLK - working in
Silicon Valley or
Silicon Valley Techmakers or
Small business owners or
Future Tech Entrepreneurs or
Future Business Geek or
Undergraduate and Graduate students wanting to make it in SILICON VALLEY or
Just a  Curious Case ...... 

Join us in our meeting where all kindred women souls gather together to boost, motivate,create,mentor or just chat about BIZ- BUSINESS. We get right down to the real deal - How to make it big in Silicon Valley in BIZ. Bring in your sister,mother,aunts,co-worker,boss and have a jolly good time meeting strong pioneering women and exchanging ideas for our bright future.

name: Polka Dot Powerhouse Palo Alto Chapter
description: First, it's important to note that we are not a networking group with attendance and referral requirements! We are a connections organization! I truly believe that when women connect and genuinely get to know each other that then they want to help each other whether it is personal development or their business. This group has improved not only my life but so many of us because we surround ourselves with positivity! We officially launched the Palo Alto/Los Altos chapter back in March and after just a few short months we are now over 60 members strong in this chapter and meeting twice a month! Currently we meet at Breathe Holistic Health center (a members space) from 11:30am-1:30pm 2x a month. Registration is required and last minute cancellations heavily frowned upon. CLICK HERE to learn more and register -->https://www.polkadotpowerhouse.com/link-to-chapters/129-palo-alto-ca More about us: Drama Free, Respectful, Inspiring, Successful women,.. we may or may not work for ourselves, or well known companies, or coach, train, advise, organize, educate... we have published authors, well known speakers, and top sellers in their respective companies within our nationwide organization and right here in Silicon Valley. We don't judge you, come as you are, be amazed that something like this exists! And the best part is we are growing SO FAST! we now have established chapters in Fremont, San Jose, San Mateo, Half Moon Bay, SF, Sonoma, Fresno, Visalia, Reno and all over the country. It is a very exciting time to be a woman!

name: True Beauty Revealed Spiritual Growth & Life Transformation
description:
This Group Is For Women That Want To Release Stagnancy And Old Negative Energy. If You Are Seeking A Holistic Path To Wellness And Want To Experience A Transformational Shift In Every Aspect Of Your Being, Develop Your Own Personal Growth Strategy And Become More Aware Of The Sacred Places Within You, This Is The Healing Space For You.

We Offer Ancient Wisdom Healing Traditions, Sacred Practices And Powerful Intuitive Coaching For Modern Women. If You're Looking For Sustainable Transformation In Your Personal Life And Business, Please Join Us!

name: San Francisco women & wine Meetup
description: This group is for any woman who wants to make friends in San Francisco and have a good time. No judgment zone here... just good company and good wine! Events include weekly wine nights and anything else that sounds fun! Dinner nights, core power yoga, evening runs, concerts..... anything to get out and about and get to know each other. Feel free to suggest ideas!

name: Confident Woman Entrepreneur Community
description:
Are you a woman entrepreneur who knows there is much more to your life than you have been living? Do you dream of making a big impact with your business, but you hold yourself back due to fears and lack of confidence? Do you know you were put on this planet for so much more than you are currently living? You are NOT alone! This group is for women entrepreneurs who have a big calling and are ready to step up and into that calling, to bust through those fears, build your confidence, and thrive. The world needs you and your message, so come be supported, empowered, and let your light shine like the brilliant woman you are. The more confidence you have, the bigger impact you can make, in the world and your bank account.

Watch this video on how Confidence and your income are directly related... https://youtu.be/-vz7J1r41CU

This group is a community. A community of women who are building their confidence, supporting one another in their goals, dreams and aspirations. Come each month as we build relationships with one another, learn how to break through blocks, and transform from caterpillars into beautiful butterflies, so that we can all make a much bigger impact in the world, together.

Join the Confident Woman Community on Facebook at https://www.facebook.com/groups/confidencewomenentrepreneurs

I look forward to connecting with you!

With Purpose and Passion,

Erin Summ

www.erinsumm.com

Grab the FREE Report, 7 Secrets to Lasting Confidence for More Clients and Money in the Bank here... www.erinsumm.com/7Secrets

Join the FREE Stand Up and SHINE Confidence Challenge on Facebook here... https://www.facebook.com/groups/shineconfidencechallenge

Get the Stand Up and SHINE 60-Day Confidence Discovery Journal here... bit.ly/standandshine

name: San Francisco Women's Networking Meetup
description: This is a fun and casual mixer for women who want to network and meet likeminded people. We will share stories about our careers and businesses, whether you are in the start-up phase or have been working for a few years. This is your chance to meet some awsome women in San Francisco in non-judgemental enviorment who will inspire and encouage you! Feel free to bring a friend, drinks will be served!

name: 100 Coffees Meets
description: Our meetups will be an extension of the online women's communities we have developed at 100coffees.org. Members and guests will meet monthly to encourage each other and share resources for personal and business development. We will provide quarterly training events to give members a chance to meet Ambassadors and Founders while learning skills relevant to their growth path.

name: Soroptimist International Saint Helena Sunrise
description:
Soroptimist International is an international organization for Women who want to improve the lives of Women and Girls locally and internationally. We provide Scholarships for young women from High School. We also Grant Scholarships to women who are heads of households under the Live your Dream Award. Our club sponsors an annual Woman's Film Festival called Lunafest where we support two local organizations supporting women and Girls in our community ( NEWS and Girls On The Run)
We meet on the first Wednesdays of the month from 6 -7:30pm at 899 Adams St., Conference Room, where, every other month we have interesting speakers who discuss women's issues and opportunities to to empower women in our community.

name: Woke Women Rising: Retreat in Guatemala for Millennial Women
description:
Woke Women Rising is a week long travel retreat that focuses on personal development, self love and community building. We firmly believe in the transformative power of travel and the profound impact open dialogue can have on individuals and societies. Join us in this space as we take time to better ourselves in order to better our world.

Are you looking to dive deeper into defining what you really want in life and creating a concrete plan to work towards it?

Do you find yourself wanting to detach from certain beliefs, pressure, needs, the desire for material wealth, etc. that society has told you will make you happy and instead foster inner happiness?

Are you wanting to have more success in your relationships? It starts by heightening your own self-awareness, being honest with yourself about your wants, needs and expectations and becoming more confident and comfortable in communicating them to others. 

Do you want to stop giving so many f's and create your own happiness by being authentic and true to yourself. 

Do you want to deeper your own self-awareness and foster greater empathy for others by discussing important topics that are often deemed "tabu" in a comfortable and supportive environment. 

If any or all of these sound like things you're interested we would love for you to join us on this epic retreat open to 14 badass millennial women led by 3 other badass women. We will combine travel and adventure with organized workshop and activities to promote self-growth and development with the ultimate goal of creating healthier and stronger communities. 

It starts with you. Be the light. Be the change.

name: Woke Women Rising Travel Retreats for Millennial Women
description:
Woke Women Rising is a week long travel retreat that focuses on personal development, self love and community building. We firmly believe in the transformative power of travel and the profound impact open dialogue can have on individuals and societies. Join us in this space as we take time to better ourselves in order to better our world.

Are you looking to dive deeper into defining what you really want in life and creating a concrete plan to work towards it?

Do you find yourself wanting to detach from certain beliefs, pressure, needs, the desire for material wealth, etc. that society has told you will make you happy and instead foster inner happiness?

Are you wanting to have more success in your relationships? It starts by heightening your own self-awareness, being honest with yourself about your wants, needs and expectations and becoming more confident and comfortable in communicating them to others. Do you want to stop giving so many f's and create your own happiness by being authentic and true to yourself. Do you want to deeper your own self-awareness and foster greater empathy for others by discussing important topics that are often deemed "tabu" in a comfortable and supportive environment. If any or all of these sound like things you're interested we would love for you to join us on this epic retreat open to 14 badass millennial women led by 3 other badass women. We will combine travel and adventure with organized workshop and activities to promote self-growth and development with the ultimate goal of creating healthier and stronger communities. It starts with you. Be the light. Be the change.

name: M = Women
description:
We are finally beginning Home Delivery with our friends at Grubmarket.com
For you until May 15th, use Code ANNA25 to redeem 25% off of your orders!!!

We are reaching out to all Women in California.

From the Port of Oakland to the Port of Los Angeles.

We will offer our Members the following:

Education <br>Training <br>Employment <br>Investment <br>Donations

We started as Organic Farmers in Watts in our Seed Ministry - ACT SLOW.

We now own Beatrice Premier Foods/Cuppedia Corporation, USA.
