name: Self Help & Self Improvement Meetup
description: Anyone interested in improving themselves, their lives & the lives of their loved ones will find valuable data and practical applications at our meetups.

name: Brilliant Business Women ~ East Bay SF, CA
description: Brilliant Business Women (BBW) is a group designed to encourage business women to get to know each other on a deeper level to create a strong foundation for networking, referral business and professional development in efforts to support each other.

name: Communication for Coworkers and Team Members
description: Learn the skills to create and maintain a great team and co-working environment. Do you wish someone would change their behavior or attitude? Too awkward to talk about or you tried and nothing has changed? You will learn to how to have those difficult conversations with team members and coworkers, and strengthen your working relationship with them at the same time.

name: ITU Career & Industry Events
description:
Are looking to stay connected with the latest trends in the tech or business fields? Trying to expand your network or hone your professional skills and expertise?

We're here to help.

International Technological University (ITU) is a graduate school, located in the heart of the Silicon Valley, that offers a diversity of professional and industry events throughout the year. Open to the public and the local business or professional communities, these events focus on delivering in-demand information on the latest in business and industry trends or emerging technologies.

With events ranging from seminars and professional associations to networking meetups and public workshops, ITU Career and Industry Events Meetups are a great way to connect with local professionals and to keep yourself informed on the latest industry trends in the tech or business fields. 

Join this meetup today to get updates on upcoming events.Learn more about how ITU can support its community and business partners at www.itu.edu/partners

Got an event you would like to host or a topic you would like to see? Contact us at CareerServices@itu.edu.

name: Go Dance!
description: We meet at different venues around the Sacramento area that have DJS and Live Music and a dance floor. All skill levels are welcome and you won't be judged, we just want to have fun! 21 or older, some clubs have a cover charge you will need to pay. Come dance!

name: Tuesday Contact Improv Class and Jam at Counterpulse
description:
EVERY TUESDAY EVENING @ CounterPulse

CLASS:
6:30-8PM
All levels from beginners to experienced dancers are welcome.

JAM:
8-10:30 pm

PRICES: $15 single class, $5 single jam, $18 class and jam
No one turned away for lack of funds.

LOCATION: CounterPulse, 80 Turk St., San Francisco

THE COUNTERPULSE JAM
An art space for contact and improvisation, experimentation and inquiry. Tuesday night jams are a focused forum for movers and shakers: experimentation is welcome, be it in physical, sociological, performative, or compositional realms. Each improvisor is responsible for their own choices. Each jam is cooked up by those who show up.

The CounterPULSE jam is the longest-running CI jam in San Francisco. Started in 1993 at what was then 848 Community Space, an important center for experimental art and performance, it moved in 2005 to CounterPULSE where it continues to be a lively part of San Francisco's thriving dance community. See http://counterpulse.org/contact-improv-clas... for more information.

TEACHERS: The pre-jam class has rotating teachers.

name: Asi Dance Company
description: Anyone passionate about dance (salsa/mambo), learning the fundamentals and improving their techniques while having fun and meeting new friends.

name: Meet and Greet Social Dance Night Out
description:
Have you ever wanted to spice up your social life in a fun and casual setting? What about wanting to lose those few extra pounds before the holidays? Or ever wanted to feel just as confident on or off the dance floor?
If you answered yes to any of these questions, come join us at Arthur Murray's for a night of hors d'oeuvres, community, and fun social dancing! No experience is required. The evening will include a fun introduction to some of the most popular dances in the Bay Area as well as networking with people with similar interests.

name: Sundays At Denny's
description: Get your laugh on with two Toastmasters specialty clubs; Laugh Lovers & Tales and Tellers! These groups are for anyone interested in overcoming fears of public speaking, including humor in speeches and presentations, and gaining leadership skills. All skill levels are welcome. Be prepared to laugh!

name: Improv For Life
description:
Let's take Improv beyond Whose Line Is It Anyway and theatrical exercises. The same activities that sharpen an actor's skills have been used very effectively to raise creativity, self-awareness, social skills, and confidence... while still having a blast! (Check out this article: http://highexistence.com/10-reasons-improv-best-tool-self-improvement/)
Improv for Life is taking it a step further than that. Every interaction, in all of life, is a dance of Self and Other/s, where we want to balance bringing our Self fully to the communication while receiving the Other fully as well. The intention is to stay present, stay aware, and hit the sweet spot where giving and receiving blend together in a seamless flow. Let's practice that together! (And we'll still get to have a blast!)

This Meetup will offer several forms of Improv. There will be conventional Improv events, but also Drum Circles, Circle Singing, Contact Improv, and other activities that are rooted in spontaneous creation through communion.

Let's get creative!

name: Bay Area Wealth Builders Group
description:
Who is not looking for financial security? This is the ultimate goal for most people, but, let's face it, financial security and freedom is actually quite hard to achieve. Fear not, as we are here to help you attain your goal. We are Bay Are Wealth Builders Group, people who know how to create wealth and teach you feasible ways to create wealth so you can retire with the assurance that you will have a secure financial future. Come, be a part of our meet up group and learn the tricks to greater wealth and financial freedom. 

We hold events, games, workshops and leadership sessions where our members can learn to create and grow their wealth. Come and join us for our next session!

name: Bay Area Black Market
description:
Bay Area Black Market is Bay Area's fastest growing Black Owned Business Directory. This meetup is for business events hosted or sponsored by Bay Area Black Market ONLY. Do NOT schedule party or club Meetups!

This group will have monthly meetups at local black owned businesses. 

Visit: BayAreaBlackMarket.com for a directory of black owned businesses in the Bay Area.

name: Founders Central SEED, ANGEL, VENTURE CAPITAL Funding
description: This group is for founders of start-ups that are looking to raise initial angel, seed or Tier 1 venture funding. This group also welcome Investors and Fundraising consultants. This group is managed by the Startups & Societal Ventures Network (SSVN), headquartered in central Central Silicon Valley (USA) Welcome to the SSV Network! The "Startups & Societal Ventures" Network http://www.ssvnetwork.com Discuss: http://www.linkedin.com/groups?gid=48286 Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/SSVNetwork Follow us on Facebook: http://tinyurl.com/ycd24uk Check the SSV Network Innovation Hubs' Worldwide Map: http://www.communitywalk.com/SSVNetwork Entrepreneurs, investors and all other resources providers need better relationships matchmaking. SSVN is an internet-based entrepreneurship support system enabling socially conscious individuals and organizations to more effectively find, engage and support each other, work together and thrive locally, remotely and internationally. As Entrepreneurship and Innovation stakeholders, we would like to collaborate and share best practices. Please get involved, by joining today! Learn how you can collaborate and build a mutually beneficial relationship. Today, our Meetup groups are : http://www.meetup.com/SSVNetworkSILICONVALL... http://www.meetup.com/SSVNetworkSANFRANCISC... http://www.meetup.com/SSVNetworkSEATTLE/ http://www.meetup.com/SSVNetworkLOSANGELES/ http://www.meetup.com/SSVNetworkDENVER/ http://www.meetup.com/SSVNetworkHOUSTON/ http://www.meetup.com/SSVNetworkMIAMI/ http://www.meetup.com/SSVNetworkNEWYORK/ http://www.meetup.com/SSVNetworkBOSTON/ http://www.meetup.com/SSVNetworkWASHINGTOND... http://www.meetup.com/SSVNetworkUSAFUNDING/ http://www.meetup.com/SSVNetworkCANADA/ http://www.meetup.com/SSVNetworkAUSTRALIA/ http://www.meetup.com/SSVNetworkUK/ http://www.meetup.com/SSVNetworkISRAEL1/ http://www.meetup.com/SSVNetworkSPAIN/ http://www.meetup.com/SSVNetworkGERMANY/ http://www.meetup.com/SSVNetworkFRANCE/ http://www.meetup.com/SSVNetworkHONGKONG/ http://www.meetup.com/SSVNetworkSHANGHAI/ http://www.meetup.com/SSVNetworkWUXI/ http://www.meetup.com/SSVNetworkSWEDEN/ http://www.meetup.com/SSVNetworkSOUTHAFRICA... http://www.meetup.com/SSVNetworkBANGALORE/ http://www.meetup.com/SSVNetworkSLOVENIA/ http://www.meetup.com/SSVNetworkUAE/ http://www.meetup.com/SSVNetworkRUSSIA/

name: Founders Central SAN FRANCISCO
description: Welcome to the SSV Network! The "Startups & Societal Ventures" Network http://www.ssvnetwork.com Discuss: http://www.linkedin.com/groups?gid=48286 Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/SSVNetwork Follow us on Facebook: http://tinyurl.com/ycd24uk Check the SSV Network Innovation Hubs' Worldwide Map: http://www.communitywalk.com/SSVNetwork Entrepreneurs, investors and all other resources providers need better relationships matchmaking. As Entrepreneurship and Innovation stakeholders, we would like to collaborate and share best practices. Please get involved, by joining today! Learn how you can collaborate and build a mutually beneficial relationship. Today, our Meetup groups are : http://www.meetup.com/SSVNetworkSILICONVALLEY/ http://www.meetup.com/SSVNetworkSANFRANCISCO/ http://www.meetup.com/SSVNetworkSEATTLE/ http://www.meetup.com/SSVNetworkLOSANGELES/ http://www.meetup.com/SSVNetworkDENVER/ http://www.meetup.com/SSVNetworkHOUSTON/ http://www.meetup.com/SSVNetworkMIAMI/ http://www.meetup.com/SSVNetworkNEWYORK/ http://www.meetup.com/SSVNetworkBOSTON/ http://www.meetup.com/SSVNetworkWASHINGTONDC/ http://www.meetup.com/SSVNetworkUSAFUNDING/ http://www.meetup.com/SSVNetworkCANADA/ http://www.meetup.com/SSVNetworkAUSTRALIA/ http://www.meetup.com/SSVNetworkUK/ http://www.meetup.com/SSVNetworkISRAEL1/ http://www.meetup.com/SSVNetworkSPAIN/ http://www.meetup.com/SSVNetworkGERMANY/ http://www.meetup.com/SSVNetworkFRANCE/ http://www.meetup.com/SSVNetworkHONGKONG/ http://www.meetup.com/SSVNetworkSHANGHAI/ http://www.meetup.com/SSVNetworkWUXI/ http://www.meetup.com/SSVNetworkSWEDEN/ http://www.meetup.com/SSVNetworkSOUTHAFRICA/ http://www.meetup.com/SSVNetworkBANGALORE/ http://www.meetup.com/SSVNetworkSLOVENIA/ http://www.meetup.com/SSVNetworkUAE/ http://www.meetup.com/SSVNetworkRUSSIA/

name: San Francisco Women's Group: Soroptimist International of SF
description: Soroptimist is an international volunteer service organization for business and professional women that works to improve the lives of women and girls, in local communities and throughout the world. Soroptimist International of San Francisco is part of Soroptimist International, comprising almost 100,000 members in about 120 countries around the world. If you would like to know more about the Soroptimist, please also see our website at http://www.soroptimist.org The heart of Soroptimist's mission is to "make a difference for women" through volunteer service to the community. Projects are carefully chosen to address challenges unique to today's women. Sample club projects include providing minority women with routine medical care, funding domestic violence shelters, sponsoring career development programs for teen mothers, and tutoring women in literacy and basic job skills. There are eight Soroptimist groups in the Bay Area. The Soroptimist organization provides an enriching environment for women to develop friendships while experiencing the satisfaction of their collective efforts to improve their community.

name: Successful Business Women
description:
Successful Business Women formed after another networking group near and dear to many of us closed. 

We are committed to empowering women entrepreneurs by allowing them to present and enhance their unique strengths. This is achieved by sharing their business experiences and knowledge through regular meetings, a strong network of professional contacts, educational opportunities, and ongoing support.

We meet the first and third Wednesday of every month.  We encourage networking, growth and support of each other's businesses.  We are a closed category exclusive networking group for women in business.

Also, be sure to click here to LIKE us on Facebook

name: The Naked Traders Wealth Builders
description:
This group is organized by the members of The Naked Traders.com.  The group is open to anyone that is interested in building wealth in the stock and options market.  The Naked Traders team will guide you through the markets and outline the highest probability trades that the market has to offer.

 

Trade Well,

The Naked Traders Team

name: Ladies Meet over a Meal
description:
Hello Ladies,

There are so many of us out here in the San Francisco and Bay Area; we all have different interests, different backgrounds and skills, as well as different preferences in what we eat. Since I love eating and figure many others do too, I thought it would be fun to use the lunch hours to bring us all together. Whether you want to try new restaurants, meet some new, exciting, and different people, or simply just build your connections... I invite you to join us for some of our lunches. Most lunches would be in restaurants around the downtown, north beach, and financial district area during the weekdays. Right now, I am looking into Fridays, but feel free to give me suggestions of restaurants or days that may work better for you.
Look forward to meeting many of you!

Jenny

name: NORTH BAY ADVENTURES!
description:
Meet other men and women in your community for some great upcoming events!
Couples and singles and women's groups are welcome!

We will be sponsoring photography, wine tasting, epicurean food delights,
music and dance, outdoor hikes and moonlight walks, tidepooling, building sand castles, exploring the redwood forests and fern canyons, viewing and making art, and much much more! There will be fun events and activities for everyone!

We were the first North Bay Adventures club although it appears that someone else is using our name. We were founded on February 21, 2009. This group sponsor is a Park Ranger with experience in outdoor activities including: camping, campfires, bon fires, hiking, nature walks and interpretation of the animals and plants of the local areas and the incredible marine life found on the Sonoma Coast! We have access to both public and private properties allowing more opportunities for exploring the incredible locations in Sonoma County. Having been a Park Ranger for over 30 years that wealth of knowledge and experiences are brought to North Bay Adventures!

name: Sacramento Business Social Network Group
description:
LOOKING TO GENERATE MORE REFERRAL BUSINESS?

The Sacramento Business Social Network Group is a local community of business owners and professionals whose members actively work to refer and generate business for one another.

Through regular meetings and activities our members help you find new clients and grow your business.

WHAT IS A SOCIAL NETWORK GROUP? HOW DOES IT WORK?

We are primarily a group of business people looking to meet new clients and referral sources during social events. We have found that quick meet and greet style networking events are not nearly as effective as creating long lasting relationships with other professionals. We are committed to building a strong core of 30-40 regular attendees with a constant ebb and flow of new-comers to meet.

Business types represented include: realtors, mortgage brokers, contractors, web designers, consultants, financial planners, accountants, software developers, recruiters, HR consultants, business development professionals, CPAs, corporate trainers, carpet cleaners, landscapers, architects, attorneys, chiropractors and countless others. These members work to actively cross-refer and refer business to one another in their daily communications with customers and prospects.

name: Getting Things Done (GTD) group - David Allen's method
description: Interested in joining a GTD (Getting Things done) support group to get fully established in the David Allen philosophy and method? Come join us! If you haven't been exposed to GTD yet, grab the book (called Getting Things Done) -- you can also get a condensed audio version on iTunes, and then come to one of our events to take your practice to the next level.

name: Prosperous Living Lifestyle- The IWAA
description:
Prosperous living lifestyle

The purpose of creating this prosperous living community is to positively stimulate the mature person experiencing any of the many life transitions by following the IWAA Achievement Principles. These principles have been carefully crafted and researched for effectiveness and creativity. This involves identifying and using your strengths and other related untapped resources such as your natural environment, connections, personal skills, and identifying untapped opportunities. We will empower you by linking you to resources for career, business, educational tools and lifetime opportunities.

As part of a Global Network of Women, this group is now virtual with a yearly conference ( The Prosperous Living Conference)  occasionally we do  hold group sessions. We also have a Facebook page and group page for conversations, networking and promotions. We ask you to please visit our pages and communicate with other participants sharing your challenges as well as successes. prosperouslifestye@groups.facebook.com


We seek to inspire you with testimonies of real life stories of success that have used our proven methodology of relying on the IWAA achievement principles that have demonstrated proven results.

All postings will be done via the message board and email system of this forum.

Thank you and Welcome to the group.

'Achieving your best life ever is our goal.'

name: Aptos Womens Leads Club
description:
The Aptos Women's Leads Club is for women who want to build a strong network and quality referral base to expand their business. Our mission is to share and expand our sphere of influence to strategically build our business in the community.

Guests are invited to visit two times free of charge.

We meet weekly on Thursdays at 12-noon. Please contact our Leadership team if you'd like to attend to get the logistics and make sure that your business category is not already filled. Please contact Kathy Abma (kathyabma@gmail.com) or Edna Vilozny (edna@viloznyinsurance.com)

As of April 2016, we are especially interested in filling the following business categories: 

    Therapist 

    Esthetician

    Website Designer

    Photographer

    Doula

    Computer repair/maintenance/tech support

    Family law attorney

    Personal or virtual assistant

    Landscaper

    Event Planner

    Housecleaning

    Personal stylist/Image consultant

Even if you are in a business category not listed here, please contact us. Maybe we don't know that we need you!

The purpose for this meetup group is to share publicly our events. There is still a membership application process to be an official member of the Leads Club. You are welcome to visit 2 meetings free of charge.

name: Women Entrepreneurs Extraordinaire!
description:
Welcome! I am very excited that you are visiting this site. Our group is designed to build friendships and support the dynamic women that have chosen to build entrepreneurial businesses. Whether you work from home or have a small office we welcome you to our group. We love connecting with other dynamic female entrepreneurs to network or mingle for coffee and lunch dates. We are focused on creating business success for all women. Our meetups are to build and encourage one another and provide crucial business tools. In addition to the monthly meetups we have an off site web presence at www.WomenEntrepreneursExtraordinaire.com  We also have a Facebook group where you can connect with women who are not in the area, as well as, our Facebook business page @womenentrepreneursextraordinire.

In addition we have a weekly live internet radio show at http://www.blogtalkradio.com/womenentrepreneursextra . On our newly launched show we provide business support through education and highlighting of our members-wherever they may be.

Our membership fee here on meetup is $45 annually. We also have an AMAZING membership through the main website that provides business tools and training all month long. There you can join with a basic membership at $97 annual (or monthly of $10) or premium membership of $297 annual (or monthly $30). To check out more on this email Julie our organizer at info@WomenEntrepreneursExtraordinaire.com 

Please join us and grow your business and networking relationships!

name: Peninsula Ladies Social Group
description: Intelligent, career-driven, hardworking, and in desperate need of a girls' night out. Does this describe you? If so, you're in the right place! Living in the Bay Area as a professional woman is great, except once in awhile you'd like to take a break from work, or the significant other, etc. and just relax and enjoy conversation and a glass of wine over dinner with other similarly situated women. Whether you'd like to expand your social network, are new in the area and want to meet potential friends, or you just want to sit back and enjoy some much needed girlfriend time, this group may be just perfect for you. Monthly meet ups include casual dinners, happy hours, brunch, movies, hiking, bowling, etc. will be set up for all of us to unwind, take a break from everyday drama, and just enjoy each other's company. I'm looking forward to meeting you!

name: SVF Tech Women
description:
Meet other women (and men) who are interested in empowering women in all kinds of technology and encouraging girls to pursue education in science, technology, engineering or math (STEM) that will prepare them for career opportunities in technology.

Discuss topical strategies for advancement, handling issues in the workplace, personal and professional development as well as the emerging technologies of interest.

name: Women's Circles and Events
description:
This group has two goals: Have a place for women who are drawn to sitting in circle with other women and / or women looking to participate in women only groups for spiritual growth, self exploration and transformation.

Women have come together in ritual, healing and celebration for millennia. I deeply trust the healing power that occurs when we gather as women and share our stories. As well as when we engage in processes of deep transformation together. Some of the ways I offer this to the community in my work is through: women's circles, expressive arts groups, Holotropic Breathwork as well as retreats and other events

Some of our meet ups are closed circles for those who enroll in the full nine week process (you can miss two of the 9 weeks). If this is not what you are looking for this time, we will keep you informed of other future women's events. we do have sometimes new and full open and free circles for women to get a taste of this work.

My intention in my groups is to create a sacred and supportive space for women to dive deep within, and find new places of opening, expression and resting in the integration of all of who they are.

In the circle, Mujeres, Altares y Milagritos we will explore the lineage of the women that came before us as the core inquiry:

    What were the messages and stories we received from them?

    How have they informed and formed who we are ?

    What are places of release and which of honoring ?

    How do we integrate these messages so they enrich our live story ?

    What is your own unique voice and story ?

In this group we will use of the expressive arts, circling with other women, altar and ritual, as powerful exploratory, empowering and integrative tools.

These groups are for women who are looking to find a supportive and inspiring space with other women, with the purpose of deep transformation, playfulness and a sacred space that will hold the various colors of the inner process. As well as produce lasting insights, change and growth in their lives.

name: Bay Area Boutiquers
description:
Here is where you will find out about all the big and small boutiques and craft fairs happening in the Bay Area.

Having a boutique? This is the place to post your information and to find vendors for your event.

Own your own business? Like to participate in boutiques? This is where you can find out about all the events that need vendors.

~~~~~Membership is $10.00 a year, which is due once you are approved for the group. You will receive an email from the organizer once your profile is approved.~~~~~~

If you do not pay your membership fee you will be removed from the group.


***PHOTO REQUIRED FOR THIS GROUP***

name: *Ladies' Night Marin*
description:
*Why: No doubt we live in a beautiful county! However, living in Marin, I know how challenging it can be to meet new people here to do fun things with both during the week and on the weekends. This group is a perfect forum to expand your social circle to include real Ladies who know how to have fun whether it be while teaming up for a local trivia night, hiking out to the beach, making dinner, taking the ferry over to a Giants game, potlucks, wine tasting, live events, shopping, brunch, you name it!

*How: Sign Up to attend a Meetup or Suggest one you want to host and the organizer with approve and announce your idea!!!

*The Scoop: This is a group of ladies (in their mid-twenties to late-thirties and beyond) who host get togethers with each other and plan fun outings such as live music, happy hour, festivals, sporting events, etc... We encourage you to host a meet-up at your home, which could be centered around a theme that you create!!! (Pizza making? BBQ? Craft projects? Drink mixing? Chick flick viewings? Any ideas are welcome)

*Who should join: You're fun-loving female.  You live within Marin County or the vicinity.  You're interested in creating new friendships.

name: Techie/Maker Families Unite!
description: We are a Bay Area moms and families group full of engineers, makers, programmers and techies of all stripes. This isn't your typical mommies group! We promote family friendly tech events and other ideas for sharing technology with your kids or getting away for a while with other tech oriented folk. Events we promote may be all over the Bay Area, but they will be worth the drive.

name: Women in Tech - SF Bay Area
description:
A community of women in technology where we talk tech in a non-judgemental friendly environment.

Goals: A monthly happy hours where we will talk about a pre-decided topic based on group suggestions. Eg: technology(Hadoop, Ruby-On-Rails etc.), latest start-up trends, use of latest technology in our daily lives etc..

Please don't feel you have to be an expert on that topic or for that matter know anything about it. If you are just interested in knowing more about it this is the place for you. We are all Super Women in our fields and it would be interesting to know about other things, as simple as that.

If you are working a project and would need help in technology or other aspects of project development you can ask for advice and get feedback from members of our group. We can have special meetups for those kind of activities.

If tech is what interests you come join our tech camaraderie.

DISCLAIMER:

The organizer reserves the right to say No. This group assumes ABSOLUTELY NO responsibility, including but not limited to injury or loss of any kind/form due to the use of information, or participating in activities found on this group/site. The organizer assumes no responsibility for any damage/loss of any kind/form related directly/indirectly to any kind of information found on this meetup group.

name: Silicon Valley Women in Technology
description:
I recently attended my first conference for women in technology (the Grace Hopper Celebration) and was blown away by how exciting it was to be surrounded by so many smart, awesome women in tech. Join up if you want that experience (on a smaller scale, of course) here in Silicon Valley!

I'm picturing this as a group where we can get together socially and meet other women who share our passion for computers and technology. We could also meet up at events like She's Geeky or attend tech seminars.

name: Bay Area Lesbian Professionals
description:
This is a group for Bay Area professional lesbians and their friends. It's one part fun get togethers, one part networking (which can be fun too) and one part whatever we make of it together.

You can follow on twitter here: https://twitter.com/LesProfessional

name: San Francisco International Women
description:
Did you move solo to San Francisco for work? Or maybe you followed your partner to Silicon Valley? Or perhaps you're an American who has spent considerable time living internationally?

This is a group for international women who moved to the US for their partner's or their own work, or American women who have spent time living abroad, and are looking for likeminded friends. You are interested in meeting others in a similar situation and would like to become part of a group whose sole focus is to help 'international women' make more friends :) 

Come and join us! We meet once a month in San Francisco (a poll of members showed mid week drinks was the most desired event type) but are always open to have other types of events (lunch, brunch, dinner, picnics, hikes, museums etc). We really encourage members to suggest events.

name: Girl Develop It San Francisco
description:
Want to learn how to code? Have a great idea? Don't be shy, Develop it!

Girl Develop It is a non-profit teaching women how to code since 2010. We host a wide range of technical classes and workshops including beginner classes (Web Development, Beginner HTML/CSS, Javascript101) and advanced topics (AngularJS, Node, D3). We also organize professional events such as Meet the Company, Salary Negotiation, and Resume Building.

Join Us! We can't wait to see what you build.

name: Women's Networking Alliance Chapter 118
description:
Founded in 2007, The Women's Networking Alliance was created to enable a networking of women business owners that can truly and genuinely help one another. Formed in small groups of no more than 30 businesswomen, each chapter is designed to ensure strong partnerships in an intimate setting. 

What makes WNA successful? First, the individual person and how they present their business, support their fellow members and participate is critical. Second, a desire to share ideas in all facets of our business, a willingness to speak to wins/losses's and the courage to speak up when you are struggling will allow the entire group to easily grow together personally and professionally. And lastly, having an extreme level of honesty, integrity and trust is absolutely required. We are sharing a lot of personal information amongst the group and we must feel we can trust that our "sharing" is kept confidential and not shared with anyone, especially in the form of gossip.

Visit our web site at http://www.womensnetworkingalliance.com

name: Women Leaders and Entrepreneurs
description:
Welcome to our Women Leaders and Entrepreneurs group!

We welcome all visionary women who are looking to find potential cofounders, team members, investors, mentors, but most importantly, life-long friends. 

Connect with like-minded women, bounce off your ideas and get support for your business/projects from other women leaders and entrepreneurs.

Join us!

name: Promote Her Business
description:
Join the Promote Her Business (PHB) Community!

Promote Her Business (PHB) is a powerful professional development organization for small to mid-sized businesses , who already have great products and services and want more people know about them!  And our community is very passionate about promoting each other and having more women get known for their greatness!

PHB is proud to be known for promoting your business: Online. Offline. All the time!

We are also proud to be known for welcoming both Women and Men to participate in the community:) 

In order to give you as much traction as possible in the marketplace and support you in creating legacy brands and sustainable businesses, we specialize in the following: 

1) Teaching you -- and your team -- the BEST PRACTICES in Marketing, Sales, and Business Strategy for this YEAR

2)  Referring you to our "PHB Preferred" Network, so you can get known for what you do best and delegate the rest (to already vetted experts)! 

3)  Introducing you to a community of extremely supportive high-achievers, so you can network with new power partners, form strong strategic alliances and hold each other accountable 

4) Giving you opportunities to showcase your products/services at socials, in our "most interesting product/service" contests and/or apply to be a speaker or part of our referral network   

5) Putting on both virtual and in-person events... so you can benefit from being part of the community no matter where you are located  

For more information go to www.PromoteHerBusiness.com and remember to join us on Facebook!

name: Women in Robotics - Bay Area
description:
Fellow roboticists, it's time to celebrate women in robotics. We're badass.

This is a group for women working in robotics or women who are interested in working in robotics. We meet to socialize, and to discuss robotics and AI in an informal setting with the purpose of building a community around women in these fields. We are inclusive of anyone who identifies as female, genderqueer or non-binary.  Men who support our mission are invited to attend our meetups as guests of female members or with permission from the organizers (please send a message to introduce yourself!), though priority will be given to female members if an event is overbooked.  Women are invited to join our Slack group by signing up at womeninrobotics.org.

name: Sonoma County Connections Forum for Women in Business
description: We are a nonprofit organization that serves women in business through community service & education while providing networking and support for women in business. We meet twice a month, first Wednesday evening Mixer and third Friday morning breakfast. We have great speakers and fantastic networking!

name: Data Driven Women
description:
Data Driven Women is a community-building series and speaker event that brings together women (& men) passionate about building a stronger female tech community. Our name doesn't come from a desire to discuss only data, but rather from a data driven approach that allows us to bring metrics and measurement to different topics like innovation, diversity, entrepreneurship, and technology.

What to Expect...

Two to three times per quarter we open up our doors to members of our community to meet, connect, eat, drink, and hear inspiring women leaders share their story. A typical event looks something like this:

    6:30 pm Doors open - Food, Drinks, and Networking

    7:00 pm The Talk Begins

    7:30 pm Q&A and Discussion

    8:00 pm More Networking

    8:30 pm Goodbyes

name: Networking for Women Entrepreneurs
description: This is a meetup for women who want to learn from other women on how to start a high-tech company in Silicon Valley. We will learn from one another, network, make introductions for each other, and create an old girls network. We will bring in women who are at different stages at their startups to talk to us about how they did it, what worked and what did not work for them. Come join this exciting group and create your community.

name: Enlightened Women Entrepreneurs
description:
This meetup group is designed to empower and inspire women to create businesses that are financially thriving, spiritually satisfying, and serve the people they love to serve. This meetup has a powerful community that allows women to find their authentic voice and learn how to freely express herself with grace and confidence that magnetizes perfect clients and flowing abundance.

Our movement is for women who are ready to get support and be empowered to do business in a way that is fun and inspiring while making a big difference in the world.

We are looking for women who are ready to step out of their box, take a chance and create a life filled with abundance, prosperity, confidence and love. Who wants to create this success for herself so she can give back to others through love, support and her talents as well as pay it forward through knowledge, experience, and self-expression.

This group is designed to bring heart-centered business women together for networking, support, community, brainstorming, collaborating, and growth to expand this movement of women helping women to thrive together. This group is for women who are looking for something more out of life and more out of being in business.

She may describe herself as a healer, coach, holistic practitioner, consultant, speaker with a desire to do more than business as usual. She wants to make the world a better place through her gifts and offerings. This group is perfect for women who are looking for other amazing women for their inner circle of support. Who think outside the box, wants to see positive change in their own life, in their community and their business.

If you are a woman searching for a greater sense of yourself and know you are destined for big things, then we would love for you to join. You don't have to know how to reach your full potential or greatness - you just have to be willing and know you are destined and deserving of greatness. I created this movement as a reminder to all of us that we as women are all in this "thing" we call life together. No women should feel alone and unsupported in your journey. All women have a purpose and unique gifts to share with the world. We must come together as a strong force and work as a team to build unity, strength, and a space for women to feel empowered, supported and loved so each woman may truly express her uniqueness and step into her complete greatness.


To your success, 


Patti Fagan

name: Confident Woman Community
description:
Are you a woman entrepreneur who knows there is much more to your life than you have been living? Do you dream of making a big impact with your business, but you hold yourself back due to fears and lack of confidence? Do you know you were put on this planet for so much more than you are currently living? You are NOT alone! This group is for women entrepreneurs who have a big calling and are ready to step up and into that calling, to bust through those fears, build your confidence, and thrive. The world needs you and your message, so come be supported, empowered, and let your light shine like the brilliant woman you are. The more confidence you have, the bigger impact you can make, in the world and your bank account.

Watch this video on how Confidence and your income are directly related... https://youtu.be/-vz7J1r41CU

This group is a community. A community of women who are building their confidence, supporting one another in their goals, dreams and aspirations. Come each month as we build relationships with one another, learn how to break through blocks, and transform from caterpillars into beautiful butterflies, so that we can all make a much bigger impact in the world, together.

Join the Confident Woman Community on Facebook at https://www.facebook.com/groups/confidencewomenentrepreneurs

I look forward to connecting with you!

With Purpose and Passion,

Erin Summ

www.erinsumm.com

Grab the FREE Report, 7 Secrets to Lasting Confidence for More Clients and Money in the Bank here... www.erinsumm.com/7Secrets

Join the FREE Stand Up and SHINE Confidence Challenge on Facebook here... https://www.facebook.com/groups/shineconfidencechallenge

Get the Stand Up and SHINE 60-Day Confidence Discovery Journal here... bit.ly/standandshine

name: discoverHER: Santa Cruz Socialites
description:
Our Mission: discoverHER

To build a resource hub for all women across Santa Cruz to discover, inspire & celebrate... together.

Our Story: Building Community

Santa Cruz Socialites: discoverHER.life exists because we saw the need to create a society of women whose network and friendships could naturally cultivate relationships, a place where authentic conversations take place and your guard can be down. Our goal is to spark bonds between women who are unlikely to know each other and plant the seed of community.

Santa Cruz Socialites, now: discoverHER.life , the resource hub for all women across Santa Cruz to discover, inspire & celebrate together. From the Household Director, Stay-at-Home-Mom, the Solopreneur, to the Corporate Executive and the Retiree. With a Women in Business: discoverHER directory, events and resources. We are the community and platform to support you in business and in life.

https://discoverher.life/

name: Soroptimists of the San Ramon Valley
description: Soroptimist International is a global volunteer movement working together to transform the lives of women and girls.Our network of around 80,000 club members in 130 countries and territories works at a local, national and international level to educate, empower and enable opportunities for women and girls. This Meetup is for women in the San Ramon Valley area.

name: Women's Connection Circle -Livermore - Share-Care-Grow
description:
Stay tuned!

A circle for women to SHARE herself (be seen) in a safe container, CARE (support other women) and 

GROW herself to be the best person she can be.

name: Girls Can Hack
description: This is a group for women interested in technology in general and Cyber Security in particular. No experience is needed. Let's get together and share our thoughts, knowledge , curiosity and projects. Let's hack.

name: You Can't Have Too Many Girlfriends
description: This group is for women who are looking to make great lasting friendships based on the concept that it takes quality time to build quality friendships! I started this group because as a Bay Area newbie, I see the importance of having a strong network of girlfriends to experience all of life's triumphs and woes with. It's about celebrating friendship, ambition, womanhood and adventure! I really look forward to building great bonds with you all!

name: San Francisco Girlfriends 30's and 40's
description: This is a group of fun, sophisticated, and professional women in their mid-late thirties to forties in San Francisco who are looking to meet new friends with similar interests. Let's get together for drinks, dinner, hiking, biking, brunch...anything!

name: Women Partnering in Business East Bay
description: Please join us as we collaborate and create dynamic business partnerships between professional women in the San Francisco East Bay region. Our goal is to form business partnerships by sharing and supporting other women business owners and professionals in our community. Our group is not category specific, nor are there monthly attendance requirements. However, we do ask that you come to our events not only to expand your own business but also to help grow the businesses of the other attendees. We will alternate between lunch events and evening happy hours.  At the lunches, there will be time for networking and everyone will have a short time to introduce yourself and your business. The evening events are an informal time to get to know each other and our businesses in a less structured format. Please bring business cards, flyers or any other promotional materials you wish to either event.

name: Davis Women seeking new women friends
description:
I started this in 2015 because my last two friends living in California and Davis moved out of town, and I found myself looking for friends not just to do things with, but also to sometimes have serious conversations about topics of import to our country, our world, our families and to our inner selves. 

This group is not about specific activities, but about activities as a way to interact with other women.  Sometimes this leads to personal friendships outside the group, and sometimes it's just about a get-together with other women.  But EVERY meeting so far has been a GREAT TIME.   We do have lots of brainiacs, but we have plenty of regular people to keep us balanced.  There is a strong contingent of younger women, a good number of women with children in school and number of us are empty nesters. 

This should go without saying, but intolerance and back-biting is absolutely unacceptable.  If you don't like someone, keep it to yourself.  If you don't like an entire group of people, such as Jews or African Americans, then this isn't the right place for you.  You don't have to be a Liberal, but you do have to be willing to take each woman as an individual, and not judge her based on her race, religion, etc. 

This is group is strictly for women who live in Davis, or who work a regular Davis job with a Davis address.  (If you live elsewhere, why not start a group yourself?  It's easy!)

All new members are asked to come to a get together within their first three months, plan a get together within their first three months, or contribute toward the cost of maintaining the group, which I personally pay for out of my (very lean) pocket.

We all look forward to meeting you soon!

Best wishes,

Alex

name: Mentoring Women in Tech
description: We aim to help women enter and grow in the tech industry. We'll feature leaders from Silicon Valley to share their growth stories. There will be opportunities to network with professionals in the tech industry. Most importantly we hope to inspire women and help them with professional advice.

name: Women Who Want to Start a Business
description: This group is for Women who are open to try new business ventures, who are very passionate about their ideas, who are extremely ambitious, who are willing to go the extra mile to be very successful and do not fear the hurdles and challenges in life. The group already consists of women who are successful in their respective businesses and are willing to share their road to success with other women.

name: Women Entrepreneurs in Bloom~ ElCerrito,CA
description:
Women Entrepreneurs in Bloom is a community of women artists, coaches, healers and creative entrepreneurs who want to get their work out there in a bigger way, while remaining true to their values and becoming profitable. This is a community of soulful women who want to connect more deeply to their feminine power and with other women, so they can continue to take courageous and inspired steps in their life and business. Come join us and get ready to Bloom Into You!

There is a quiz you can take which determines Your Unique Sacred Money Archetype (this is the way you relate to money). It's a powerful tool I use with clients to support you in empowering your money conversation. Here is a link to take the quiz---> http://bloomintoyou.com/takequiz/ <br>

I look forward to seeing you at our monthly Business Women in Bloom events! Please feel free to share with the women in your life. Look for us on Facebook.

https://www.facebook.com/BloomIntoYou

Please RSVP space is limited.

Kadidja Yansane is a Business Coach who works with clients to own their value, charge their worth and get paid to do what they love through private coaching, classes and women's circles. Schedule your one-on-one complimentary 60 minute Discovery Session (valued at $400) with me by going to http://bloomintoyou.com/now/

Call, text or email me if you have any questions. <br>

Kadidja at (310) 924-0687 <br>

email kadidja@bloomintoyou.com

http://www.bloomintoyou.com <br>

name: Women Empowerment /Manteca Entrepreneurship Meetup
description: Women creating wealth a new generation of financial freedom! Having freedom to spend time with your children and family. Not having to live pay check to pay check. At our meetup group meeting we want to inspire you to be the person you want to be or become.

name: Successful Women of Central Valley Networking Mixers
description:
We are a group of local women dedicated to empowering, inspiring, networking, supporting and assisting women in the Central Valley. We believe in and support the "Whole Woman" recognizing that there are many facets of our lives and many levels to connect with other women in our community. Our desire is to create a welcoming environment where we can all realize our goals personally, professionally, and socially in our community.

www.SWCV.org

name: Woven: Marin Women Connecting Meetup
description: If you crave the company of other women... if you want meaningful connection and support... if you seek a more balanced, purposeful, joyful and healthy life... if you get excited by the idea of laughter and a good time with like-minded women... if you get goosebumps by the concept of creating positive change in the world -- than join us! We want to create a local community of women to share wisdom, stories and support.

name: Woven: San Francisco Women Connecting Meetup
description:
If you crave the company of other women... if you want meaningful connection and support... if you seek a more balanced, purposeful, joyful and healthy life... if you get excited by the idea of laughter and a good time with like-minded women... if you get goosebumps by the concept of creating positive change in the world -- than join us! We want to create a local community of women to share wisdom, stories and support.

Check us out at www.wovenweb.com or https://www.facebook.com/wovenweb

name: Women In Growth Marketing (San Francisco)
description:
Women in Growth Marketing is a community of women and men learning from experts in Growth at startups and supporting women as they build their presence in the world of Growth. 

We spotlight accomplished women working in our field, giving them a platform to share their knowledge and inspire other women building their careers in growth. 

Men are welcome to join the group too!

name: Skin Care & Wellness Meetup
description:
Seeing is believing, we will invite skin care and wellness expert on regular basis to share skin care / wellness tips, and do demos and offer free skin care / wellness service ...etc!

Come and join us, meet with other ladies, and get educated about the knowledge which will help you to stay young and beautify!

name: Women's Empowerment Movement Meetup
description: This is a group dedicated to inspiring and leading women to live in their life purposes, be grounded in their self-worth, and join in raising the consciousness of the planet. Meetings will include inspirational talks, networking, social gathering, support, and all out fun.

name: SF Lezervations / LBTQ networking
description:
It's like a big family dinner, if your entire family were made up of lesbians. All letter welcome!

Think of it as quarterly meetings of lesbian minds over dinner.

Our events are designed to facilitate connections amongst queer women as well as unlock the potential of city living. 

From local gastronomic delights, to unique experiences in unique spaces, to nurturing emerging women leaders, Lezervations has a little something for everyone. And by everyone, we mean lesbians.

Join us! 

Isabelle & Dara

name: Women in 3D Printing North America
description:
Let's have a casual drink once a month and meet members of the Women in 3D Printing community.

Don't forget to check out our blog too: https://womenin3dprinting.com/

name: Great Girlfriends (30's and 40's)
description:
Welcome!  

This is a group for women who want to get together and make new friends with other wonderful, smart, positive and strong women. Please join this group if you are a female professional living in San Francisco and are love eating, enjoy cultural experiences, being active and are committed to making new, healthy relationships. 

This group is inclusive, inviting and warm, with the goal to make friendships that last beyond the confines of a meetup group. We'll talk about real issues, build relationships by doing things together (note: eat, explore, be active, etc.) and celebrate our successes and experiences. 

We'll be organizing smaller group events so everyone can have the chance to connect and get to know each other. This group is going to remain small and personable. 

We welcome your feedback and suggestions for new activities, restaurants to try and get-togethers. 

Please respect this group by only RSVP'ing if you are able to show up. A reminder email will be sent out 24 hours before the event to confirm your attendance. A no-show (without an email / text with a valid reason) and you will be removed from the group. No flakiness, please :) 

Also, you need to please have a picture with your face visible and a first name in order to join the group. 

Looking forward to meeting you and making new, strong female friendships. 

Jules & Robin

name: marin women  connecting
description: This is a group for women in their 4o's, 50's and 60's who want to create time to develop a community of friends. It might be having dinner/drinks, walking and talking, coffee , potlucks, spa days.

name: Women & Wine in the Valley Meetup
description: A community of women supporting other professionals, business owners and entrepreneurs. We meet once a month at different (or the same) wine bars, also looking to improve our knowledge of wines....look forward to starting a tradition in wine country!

name: FEMININE PROSPERITY Meetup Group
description:
Hello Ladies,

I created this group because I have found that women thrive when they are an integral part of a loving, supportive, emotionally healthy community.

We've heard many spiritual teachers, and now scientists as well, telling us that we really do create our own reality. But we have been programmed from our earliest years with lies about who we are and what we are capable of doing and being. In order to reverse that programming from our parents, our schools, our media and our entire society, we need a lot of support. We need a community consisting of loving people who take 100% responsibility for their lives and challenge you to do the same. We need a clear system to follow which teaches us how to dance with the Law of Attraction in a way that really works. Through exciting, transformational events, supportive meetings and fun activities, we are committed to keeping our vibration HIGH as much of the time as possible. Feeling wonderful, laughing, loving, creating ordinary miracles attracts more of the same! Come join us on our wild joyride!

If you'd like to understand what I mean by "Feminine Prosperity," 

see this website: https://about.me/caliwaysumati

name: Make Money Doing What You Love
description: Our group is for professional women and men launching or building a business based on your purpose, passion and greatest gifts. You will learn strategies, tools and practices for clarifying your goals, increasing your income, your impact and satisfaction. Our events will help you resolve your present challenges and get support for realizing your life vision.

name: Ladies Happy Hours - Peninsula Late 20s to Early 40s
description:
Are you a lady living on the Bay Area Peninsula?  Are you late 20s to early 40s?  Then let's get together after a long day or week of work and unwind! We are a fun and friendly group of ladies.  We meet for mid-week and weekend happy hours, festivals, breweries, holiday events, dinners, trivia nights, community events and dancing...to name a few!

Join us!

Please feel free to send your organizers any event recommendations! We are very excited to explore and try new places :)

Cheers!

name: Craft Your Ideal Business
description: Our group is for professional women and men launching or building a business based on your purpose, passion and greatest gifts. You will learn strategies, tools and practices for clarifying your goals, increasing your income as well as your impact, contribution and satisfaction. Our events will help you resolve your present challenges and get support for realizing your life vision.

name: Mid-Peninsula Meetup
description: Get to know other SF Bay Area residents while exploring restaurants, entertainment venues, museums and much more. Most of this group's activities occur on the Mid-Peninsula, and it's open for adults of all ages.

name: Profit From Your Passion and Genius
description: Our group is for professional women and men launching or building a business based on your purpose, passion and greatest gifts. You will learn strategies, tools and practices for clarifying your goals, increasing your income as well as your impact, contribution and satisfaction. Our events will help you resolve your present challenges and get support for realizing your life vision.

name: San Francisco Tapping Into Weight Loss Support Meetup
description: This is a group for health conscious professional women who are tired of diets and the starvation/deprivation cycle to lose weight and want to regain health, vitality and confidence as well as take off a few pounds. Using alternative techniques like EFT-Emotional Freedom Techniques to let go of stored up stress and negative beliefs about weight that are mostly unconscious to people, a sense of peace and freedom from within is often found and eating behaviors change naturally- WITHOUT force or will power but almost without noticing. In this way not only does stubborn weight begin to come off but it stays off and with it layers and layers of stress and old limiting beliefs that tend to hold people back from reaching their true potential in many areas of life. The weight is just a symptom often, and even the focus on food and weight. The true issue at core is our dreams. What we do we really want? Are we holding ourselves back and why? The answers are always individual, and so are the miracles that come from tapping it out! Visit Eat LIke A Goddess now for a free 90 minute POWERFUL training to transform your life with food and your body.

name: National Association of Women Property Investors-Oakland/SF
description:
National Association of Women Property Investors(NAWPI) group is built on the belief that we together can inspire women to develop wealth, wisdom and leadership nationwide through support, education and property investing. Local women's real estate investing group to help support and teach others to gain financial literacy and freedom.

(Men are also welcome).

name: Woven: East Bay Women Connecting Meetup
description:
If you crave the company of other women... if you want meaningful connection and support... if you seek a more balanced, purposeful, joyful and healthy life... if you get excited by the idea of laughter and a good time with like-minded women... if you get goosebumps by the concept of creating positive change in the world -- than join us! We want to create a local community of women to share wisdom, stories and support.

Check us out at www.wovenweb.com or https://www.facebook.com/wovenweb

name: San Jose Business Strategy Meetup
description: Ever go to a "how to network" or "how to start a business" or "how to be better, thinner, smarter, stronger, than someone else"? Only to find it is a pitch for a training, or that you just get the what, but not the how (follow thru). Well no more Myers Briggs, or B.A.N.K or whatever. Lets move past that and on to what do. or how do we accomplish our goal. What is the best way to start and update our linkedin with hands on training. Lets create your 30 second pitch. As a member of this group you will know what investors want, create a business plan. Learn How to use twitter. If you are really ready to create a life of possibilities for yourself and your business join me. Learn to close the deal (the Ask). Whether you are MLM or an inventor, or any type of entrepreneur have fun and learn the skills.

name: Sant Cruz Women's Leadership Circle
description:
If you crave the company of other women... if you want meaningful connection and support... if you seek a more balanced, purposeful, joyful and healthy life... if you get excited by the idea of laughter and a good time with like-minded women... if you get goosebumps by the concept of creating positive change in the world -- then join us!

We are creating a local community of women to network, share insights, explore the potential of our purpose, share wisdom, and learn the value and skills of conscious leadership.

name: Overwhelmed No More Women's Entrepreneur Club
description:
Overwhelmed No More Women's Entrepreneur Club is an empowering community and sisterhood for women entrepreneurs, wearing many hats, juggling work, life, motherhood, business, relationships, and a never ending To Do List that keeps them up at night. 

Join us for our Womenpreneur Networking Socials and Workshops where you will learn tools to get out of overwhelm, connect with like-minded women to network, make new friends, and connections for your business. You're welcome to promote your business with a raffle prize!

We start the Meetup with a dose of inspiration with original women's poetry from the book, Overwhelmed No More! Love Yourself to Wealth http://alturl.com/magpd, creating a safe environment of support to grow ourselves and our businesses.

After each poetry reading, open networking and connecting is available for women interested in getting to know each other better.

It's always a FUN time and women get a lot from attending our events. Join us if you'd like to get out of overwhelm and you're looking for a dynamic women's group to grow yourself and your business. We're here to support you! =)

For more info., visit www.Janna-Chin.com.

name: Startups Business & Drinks
description:
Anybody in the Bay Area in a startup, near a startup, interested in starting a startup... and who like free beer and food too.

In this Meetup we'll discuss valuable topics for entrepreneurs every time we get together. There'll be plenty of room for networking and tonnes of great discussion and valuable knowledge to take away.

This meetup is powered by www.startupsshowcase.com

name: Girls in Tech
description: Girls in Tech is a social network enterprise focused on the engagement, education and empowerment of like-minded, professional, intelligent and influential women in technology. As young women with the capacity to inspire, we made it our personal desire and passion to create and sustain an organization that focuses on the collaboration, promotion, growth and success of women in the technology sector.

name: Vacaville "Not so prim and proper" ladies, age 65+.
description: This is a group for women age 65+ who are tired of being alone, who are still energetic, and have lots to offer. A very open minded group of women who like to get together to chat, have coffee, brunch or dinner, share life experiences (we know a lot), have discussions about anything (informal), find fun things to do together. To get out of the house for a while

name: Bay Area ReBoot Accelerator for Women
description:
ReBoot Accel gets women current, connected, and confident to reenter the workforce or pivot to new careers. 

Who should join: We welcome all women, whether looking to reenter the workforce after pausing their careers, pivoting to new careers, starting businesses, currently working, or in discernment about "what's next."

Why should you join: It's more fun to learn together and know you're not the only one who's tech and professional skills could use a ReBoot too. We provide a safe and fun learning community. And connections to like-minded energized women, local career experts and resources, hiring employers, and job opportunities.

What can you expect:  Our ReBoot Connect membership program meets in person at least twice a month. We also offer longer term courses that focus on improving your tech and job search skills, like learning how to collaborate with the Google Suite, maximize LinkedIn for your job search, and build a personal and business brand through social media.

Community: Core to our mission is the importance of connections & community. We foster a strong sense of community through our membership program and our longer term courses. Connections are one of the most important pieces of finding a job, and we want to help you with just that.


Visit us at rebootaccel.com for more information.

name: Women, Startups & Entrepreneurs
description:
Network and share experiences with other women entrepreneurs at this meetup. Learn from the successes and challenges of other women entrepreneurs in various industries to help build your business or launch your product effectively. Join us to develop personally and professionally, with insight into the latest trends in the entrepreneurial world of Silicon Valley. Meet team members, co-founders, and good friends, and interact with other women entrepreneurs in your industry.

Visit www.sviacademy.com to learn more about the organizer and the community!

name: Bay Area: Highly Sensitive People Group
description:
This community is for you if you are a Highly Sensitive Person who has a passion for learning about your highly sensitive trait, living authentically, self-development, and have a strong desire to connect with others who experience the world in the same way as you do. 

The 5 common traits that distinguish a Highly Sensitive Person include: A Dynamic Sensory Experience (the 5 sense are more finely tuned), High Awareness of Subtleties in the Environment, Pays Attention to Detail, Thinks Deeply, Feels Deeply, and Highly Empathic. 

20% of the population has the innate trait of high sensitivity. It occurs equally in men and women and is found in all species. HSPs can be Extroverts as well as Introverts and this trait is expressed in every ethnic and cultural background. 

Find out here if you are a Highly Sensitive Person: http://hsperson.com/test/ This community intends to host various HSP MeetUps throughout the Bay Area. My intention is to provide a safe community for HSP to connect and grow and individuals. Once the group gets started we will have meetings with different focus topics. 

Love and light, Kavita C. Melwani, M.Ed. Transformational Coach, Hypnotist, Regressionist

  http://www.kavitalifecoach.com

name: Communication and Leadership with Toastmasters
description: This is a network of Toastmasters clubs, bound together to invite you to join the club that calls to you. You're welcome to visit a few clubs, sample the waters, see how friendly we really are. A Toastmasters International club is a community bound together working a proven program to take scared speakers and unskilled managers and grow them into confident, competent, and even amazing leaders and presenters. We're a non-profit, so we're cheap to join, and all we really want is for you to come grow in our safe environment, joining our supportive and amazing community!

name: Badass Boss Women of Santa Cruz
description:
Welcome to Badass Boss Women of Santa Cruz. 

We are a powerful group of women who are ready to leave the restraints of a J-O-B behind and become their own badass boss - growing their impact and income on their own terms! Is that YOU? Come join us! You might think of yourself as a solo-preneur but you are not alone! 

We're here to support you every step of the way to get out of overwhelm and into the luxurious experience of being your own badass boss!

This is a meet-up for women who are willing and ready to embrace all aspects of ourselves as we birth our businesses. To return to our essence in service to what wants to be born through us. Light. Dark. Fears. Desires. Vulnerabilities. Visions. Business is truly a spiritual path and you have to be a badass to navigate the wild ride!  We'll gather to remind ourselves that our visions are SO much bigger than our fears. Invite your sisters. Share the abundance.

name: EBabes TGIF Meetup
description: About EBabe's: EBabe's is the 1st Friday of each month that gives Lesbian women from all over the Bay Area a chance to be part of a community of women after a long week; See old friends, make new ones, (and more if you are looking!). It's a social event with a community consciousness. EBabes teams up with non-profit/not for profit as well as Lesbian owned business and lesbian artists ...to lend a platform so they can share what services they have to offer as well as ask for what they need. Your hosts: Lynn, Jennifer & DB are at each event to welcome you and make sure that you have a good time! We look forward to seeing you! If you have questions contact Jennifer at 510.529.5147 or email: ebabestgif@gmail.com

name: Wine, Women, and Wealth - San Ramon
description: We are building a community of women who want to have fun while learning to build and protect their wealth and share good wine.

name: Team Women Capitola Business Women Networking Meetup
description: Team Women Capitola is a group of quality business minded women looking to support each other in building and growing successful businesses in our community.

name: Soul Sister Meetup
description: The purpose of soul sister meetings would be to gather women together to have a safe place to talk about the every day issues that we struggle and strive at. It would be a meeting of the minds on what it means to be a woman and how to inspire the best in all of us. Each meeting we will focus on a specific topic to add to our tool belt.

name: WOW! Women of Worth-Christian Women's Social Meetu
description: This is a group for woman of all ages that are wanting to grow and learn from one another, make new friends, share ideas, tips, etc. with each other. We have a variety of activities as we have all ages of women and professions. We have dinners, movie nights, hiking, kayaking, special events and speakers, cooking classes, craft days, and so much more!

name: Renaissance Women's Network
description: This is a group for women entrepreneurs! Join our monthly meet-ups at the centrally located Capital One Cafe every second Wednesday of the month and mingle with women entrepreneurs of various backgrounds and stages. Whether you're someone starting a new business or already in business, this peer networking group is for you. We provide dinner, a featured speaker and facilitated peer support groups in which participants will share their current business struggles and help solve their problems by offering each others networks, experience and advice. A trained facilitator will keep track of your goals and follow up with you at the next meeting.

name: Women Supporting Women Meetup
description:
https://goo.gl/forms/cb14hIenBnrL3uyB2

This group is created for ambitious, goal oriented women and also men who are big on supporting a woman's passion & goals. We welcome women from all walks of life/industries/career levels. We started this group because we are big believers in the quote " You can have everything you want in life if you just help enough people get what they want in life". We will put on events that facilitate an environment in which we can learn from each other and trade tips/skills for success. One woman's success can only help another woman's success, let's build each other up - together!

Below are the different ways to connect with the WSW organizers and members.  Please allow 24-48hours from submission for a response to your request.  If there is a option not brainstormed yet below, please don't hesitate to reach out to us and let us know your thoughts.

Request to be part of a Panel for a WSW event

https://goo.gl/forms/aMFwR1gZdr84bCQu1

Request to be a speaker for a WSW event

https://goo.gl/forms/wkAhHoq434sYXBpI2

Request WSW Promote your event

https://goo.gl/forms/y41tQTDTjBCekynz1

Request to Sponsor a WSW event

https://goo.gl/forms/WGFYpOGZ648YMr3s2

Request to Partner with WSW to create an event

https://goo.gl/forms/cb14hIenBnrL3uyB2

Request to Promote your company at a WSW event

https://goo.gl/forms/Thoobl78FxvEaDU22

name: Silicon Valley Women with Big Dreams
description: Calling all women with Big Dreams! Let's get together to inspire and support each other to go for our Big Dreams while rocking it as moms and/or partners. Let's watch our dreams take flight as our collective wisdom propels us to different heights. Be open to receive one million dollar gems to succeed in all areas of our lives: careers/business, relations, spirituality, and health. Together we can have it all!

name: SF Socialites
description:
This meetup is for fabulous ladies in their mid-20's to early-30's looking to make new friends & explore SF! Whether you're a native or a newbie the adventures will call. Try a new activity or find girlfriends to share your beauty/fitness/entertainment rituals with.

Scared or nervous to put yourself out there? Rest assured the Socialites will offer a warm welcome...and then as a seasoned Socialite you can pay it forward to newcomers! This post collegiate group is very selective: based on your profile (interests, personality) we will determine if this will make a good home for you.

XoXo,

SF Socialites

name: Womens 45+ Weekday Lunches, Happy Hours, Movies and More....
description:
We are Positive and wise women over the age of 45 who want to get together and share some fun, authentic and amazing times together.  Hopefully in the process we will be making some life long friends.  

We are a group of women that get together during the weekdays for lunches, happy hours, movies, walks, wine tasting and whatever else sounds interesting. Some of us work, some of us are retired and some of us are trying to figure what the next chapter is going be.  

We are Not a group promoting our business.  Please do that elsewhere, as I want to keep this group strictly as a way for us women to share activities together and hopefully build incredible friendships in the process. 


*******Starting November 2017 Meetup events will be $3 for each event you attend in cash at the venue or if you would rather pay $10 for one year that is fine too.   Please do all this in cash as Meetup charges 10% if done online.

name: Dream Priestess(TM) Circle - Bay Area Women
description:
The Dream Priestess(TM) Circle is a women's gathering where you can explore everyday magic. You will awaken and deepen your spiritual gifts (e.g. intuition), step into your spiritual power as a leader, and play with new ways of accessing spiritual guidance.

Whether you're experienced with your spiritual gifts, or just discovering you have them, join us for creative exploration and fun. 

The gatherings are at my home and there's room for about 10 women. 

About Amy Brucker

Amy is a Dream Priestess(TM) with an extensive background in shamanic healing and guidance, energy reading, dreamwork, creative expression, and business coaching. In her work, Amy uses her gifts as an intuitive empath to support strong, successful women who long to integrate their spiritual gifts into the full scope of their daily lives. She offers private mentoring programs as well as the Dream Priestess(TM) Initiation Program. She has a B.A. in art and an M.A. in spirituality, and was ordained as an interfaith minister. 

The Dream Priestess(TM) engages her spiritual power to dream her life into being. She knows that the more connected she is to her intuition, imagination, dreams, and nature, the more easily she can create magic for the benefit of herself and others. 

Personal Note: 

In the 15 years I've been teaching and mentoring, I've met many women who are intuitives, empaths, psychics, mediums, etc., but who keep this part of themselves secret so they can succeed in their careers or retain respect from their family and friends. 

These women often feel like they're leaving half of themselves locked in the closet, and consequently, they feel unfulfilled and alone despite their success. Yet more and more women are tired of hiding out. They're ready to confront their fears and be more open about who they are, and that's where I can help. When my clients work wit me, they begin to trust their gifts in bigger ways. They use their gifts to navigate their lives, relationships, health, businesses or careers. They feel more and more confident in who they are, and as a result, they begin to feel the deep soulful satisfaction that comes from living their true purpose.

To learn more go to www.amybrucker.com

name: Macy's Union Square Events
description:
Macy's Union Square hosts a wide variety of events, from fashion shows to cooking demos and so much more! Join our meetup group to stay up to date on the latest happenings at Macy's in San Francisco and to receive exclusive offers when you attend! 

On this page, we've curated a unique list of select in-store events that we know you'll love - but to check out all of our upcoming events, visit macys.com/events.

name: Fertile, Strong and Happy (FSH) Support - Santa Cruz
description:
Women with a desire to increase their emotional resilience and happiness in this stress-filled environment, as well as women going through any kind of fertility challenge, are embraced in this group and allowed a safe place to meet and make buddies with other women in a similar place.


We will talk about what's going on in our lives, and look at mindfulness practice, massage, essential oils, fascia healing, acupuncture, chiropractic, sleep habits, healthy foods, creativity, and many other methods of increasing our F-S-H levels.


We will also occasionally have discussions on the latest assisted reproductive technologies (ART) available, to better understand choices available.

name: Stockton Self-Improvement Meetup
description:
Vendors | Speakers | Members

FREE SISTERS NETWORK MIXER
We Are #WSNRedHeartReady!!!

Come Out and Gain Valuable Information About Having A Healty Heart!!
WEDNESDAY, JULY 20, 2016 From 6:30 PM - 9:00 PM

We Are WSNRedHeartReady!!!

Come Out and Gain Valuable Information About Having A Healty Heart!!


Wealthy Sister Network is a nationwide organization based on women building generational wealth by being RICH in their mind, body, spirit and relationships.

If you would like to be a SPONSOR or VENDOR for this event please contact Katrina Major via email kmajor3999@aol.com or 209-259-1150.

APPLY FOR WSN STOCKTON CHAPTER MEMBERSHIP WSN has open positions for the following:
Membership Coordinator
Secretary

Responsible for recruiting and welcoming new members and keeping older members engaged

Other physical structures not included.

2 Guests to Share this Wonderful Opportunity!!!

Interested parties regarding positions and Speakers for FUTURE events contact Katrina Major ASAP.

Business owners we have a GREAT opportunity for you to be listed in the directory that will be EMAILED and PUBLISHED on the WSN site. REGISTER ONLINE:
wsnredheartready.eventbrite.com

Don't Miss Out!!!
Let's Talk About Having a Healthy Heart...

name: Trail Mavens, a Group for Adventurous Women
description:
