Our mission is also to assist women entrepreneurs, start-ups and established companies to achieve better success in their business through networking and socializing with other professionals.


I am looking forward to meeting you soon!


Brandi Madison

Organizer

name: Data Driven Women
description:
Data Driven Women is a community-building series and speaker event that brings together women (& men) passionate about building a stronger female tech community. Our name doesn't come from a desire to discuss only data, but rather from a data driven approach that allows us to bring metrics and measurement to different topics like innovation, diversity, entrepreneurship, and technology.

What to Expect...

Two to three times per quarter we open up our doors to members of our community to meet, connect, eat, drink, and hear inspiring women leaders share their story. A typical event looks something like this:

    6:30 pm Doors open - Food, Drinks, and Networking

    7:00 pm The Talk Begins

    7:30 pm Q&A and Discussion

    8:00 pm More Networking

    8:30 pm Goodbyes

name: Video Screening & Discussion - Healing Compulsive Eating
description: Meetup to see the video of a hit show, "LEFTOVERS, the Ups & Downs of a Compulsive Eater." Discussion follows. Hosted by Marcia Kimmell, one of the actor/creators of LEFTOVERS and the SF Integrative Health Network's Scott Hanedy. Sunday, June 2nd, 4:30. RSVP required. (See www.meetup.com/SF-Integrative-Health-Network/events/117015992/). This event is a project of Theater Residencies, Inc., a non-profit corporation.

name: Networking for Women Entrepreneurs
description: This is a meetup for women who want to learn from other women on how to start a high-tech company in Silicon Valley. We will learn from one another, network, make introductions for each other, and create an old girls network. We will bring in women who are at different stages at their startups to talk to us about how they did it, what worked and what did not work for them. Come join this exciting group and create your community.

name: Healing Circles for Animals and the Planet
description:
We are a group of animal lovers, Reiki practitioners, healers....and others who desire to help heal animals and the planet.  If you dream of a peaceful planet where animals are treated with kindness and compassion, if you would like to help animals and the planet ... and learn tools that can help you in your own life at the same time ... then I hope you will join us.  Current practitioners and healers are welcome, although no experience or training is needed.  All you need is an open heart and a desire to connect with like-minded and like-hearted people who love animals and want to make a difference in the world.  We will learn many different healing modalities, work with different animals and issues, and have fun at the same time.  We hope you will join us in this fun, powerful and inspiring group.

Please note we do have members who have not joined through Meetup, so there will be attendees who are not noted on this page.

name: Wicca Wimmin's Moon Ritual of Marin
description:
Blessed Be Sister! This is a Wiccan Full Moon Ritual of Pagan Goddess Worship for women, to celebrate our femininity and nurture our souls. This Sister Circle loosely follows Starhawk's style in her book The Spiral Dance. We will call in the four directions, invoke the Goddess, join our energies and raise up the cone of power to bless the world, each other, the cauldron and ourselves. The Ritual is very inclusive and you may bring things to put on the altar, or put in the cauldron to be blessed. Bring your drums and magic tools, and anything that honors the Goddess, wimmin, and your natural yin. This is a celebration of our womanhood, free of the male dynamic, for our spirits to be strengthened in total safety,  and our souls healed. Join and enjoy as we honor each other's natural womanhood, to consciously align our selves with Mother Nature's cycles. The Full Moon energy is for fullfillment of life, love, health and all goodness. Ritual is followed by a vegetarian pot luck.

Brothers, men, do not join this group.  You will be banned. Please, give your invasive and disrespectful bothers a pull up and tell them to honor our boundary. If you are genuinely interested in Wicca, read The Spiral Dance by Starhawk, and join my meetup Wicca and Witchcraft Training, then you may call me, Reverend Joey Talley, at 415.990.6020

name: Hip Chicks in Midlife
description: You know you're in midlife when you're doing what you've always done but now, you're getting different results. Your body isn't supporting you the way it always has and other things are changing in your life: your kids may be grown or leaving, your parents and/or your spouse may be gone, your employment situation may have changed and you may have outgrown other aspects of your life or lifestyle. Let's get together and meet some new friends, support each other's transitions, reinventions and transformations. We'll get together for a meal, discussions, hikes, parties, outings and especially for support. There will be opportunities to teach, learn, coach and mentor each other.

name: Women Empowerment & Self-Fulfillment, Bay Area
description: If you deserve a better life style & personal growth, wish to be in control of your life, desire to become significant in other people's life, this is the group for you. We believe that each of us has a deeper purpose in life. It is about time to find your full potential and start your journey for success. We will share with you the secrets of mindset for success. Join, be inspired, empowered, and be enhanced for self-fulfillment.

name: Freedom Hikes (For Women)
description:
I have designed Freedom Hikes for women in the SF Bay Area or Santa Cruz County who want to; make new friends, have fun!, explore nature, reconnect with their inner voice and gain clarity about direction and decisions - particularly around career/job in a beautiful, peaceful environment, while enjoying a guided, meditative experience by a Business & Freedom Coach (me :)). 

This unique experience is about finding your freedom. This includes identifying the things that may be holding you back while releasing, and embracing what's true for you in a supported, safe and fun environment. Hikes are moderate and in various gorgeous locations around the bay area and Santa Cruz. I cannot wait to meet YOU and come together as sisters!

name: Enlightened Women Entrepreneurs
description:
This meetup group is designed to empower and inspire women to create businesses that are financially thriving, spiritually satisfying, and serve the people they love to serve. This meetup has a powerful community that allows women to find their authentic voice and learn how to freely express herself with grace and confidence that magnetizes perfect clients and flowing abundance.

Our movement is for women who are ready to get support and be empowered to do business in a way that is fun and inspiring while making a big difference in the world.

We are looking for women who are ready to step out of their box, take a chance and create a life filled with abundance, prosperity, confidence and love. Who wants to create this success for herself so she can give back to others through love, support and her talents as well as pay it forward through knowledge, experience, and self-expression.

This group is designed to bring heart-centered business women together for networking, support, community, brainstorming, collaborating, and growth to expand this movement of women helping women to thrive together. This group is for women who are looking for something more out of life and more out of being in business.

She may describe herself as a healer, coach, holistic practitioner, consultant, speaker with a desire to do more than business as usual. She wants to make the world a better place through her gifts and offerings. This group is perfect for women who are looking for other amazing women for their inner circle of support. Who think outside the box, wants to see positive change in their own life, in their community and their business.

If you are a woman searching for a greater sense of yourself and know you are destined for big things, then we would love for you to join. You don't have to know how to reach your full potential or greatness - you just have to be willing and know you are destined and deserving of greatness. I created this movement as a reminder to all of us that we as women are all in this "thing" we call life together. No women should feel alone and unsupported in your journey. All women have a purpose and unique gifts to share with the world. We must come together as a strong force and work as a team to build unity, strength, and a space for women to feel empowered, supported and loved so each woman may truly express her uniqueness and step into her complete greatness.


To your success, 


Patti Fagan

name: FinTech, RealTech Bay Area
description: This group is focus on Technology professionals that like to invest in Real Estate. We meet a couple times a month and share ideas, concepts and brain storm on what constitutes a good investment. We focus on residential and commercial investments. We will be meeting informally once a month and then also in a larger group setting once a month

name: The Women's Circle
description:
Come join us, goddesses!  We'll come together in circle, and share our experiences as women and sisters.  Some weeks, we'll have ritual or exercises to play with, and some weeks will be about holding space and sharing with each other as we navigate our lives.  

There's powerful magic that happens in a circle of women...come join us in a circle of sisterhood, support, and laughter.

name: Essential Intimacy
description:
Essential Intimacy is a community designed to invite people into exploring their relationship to vulnerability, embodiment, desire, sexuality, attraction, authenticity, intimacy and pleasure...to name a few.

Many of our meetup events revolve around communication games, exercises, discussions and lectures that invite us to remove the masks we wear on a daily basis and let ourselves be witnessed for who we truly are.


About the Organizer:  

Arielle is an Embodiment Coach and Group Facilitator. She has woven together a B.A. in Clinical Psychology with a Certificate in Eating Psychology Coaching, a Certificate in Orgasmic Meditation & Relationship Coaching, and a Certificate in Transformational Leadership, to craft experiences where people are invited to embrace and embody their True Nature. 

Her diverse background comes together in a uniquely cohesive approach to helping others to rewrite outdated and self-defeating personal narratives to create powerful and positive alignment in their lives and their relationships. To learn more about Arielle's work, visit www.ariellebrown.com.

name: Confident Woman Community
description:
Are you a woman entrepreneur who knows there is much more to your life than you have been living? Do you dream of making a big impact with your business, but you hold yourself back due to fears and lack of confidence? Do you know you were put on this planet for so much more than you are currently living? You are NOT alone! This group is for women entrepreneurs who have a big calling and are ready to step up and into that calling, to bust through those fears, build your confidence, and thrive. The world needs you and your message, so come be supported, empowered, and let your light shine like the brilliant woman you are. The more confidence you have, the bigger impact you can make, in the world and your bank account.

Watch this video on how Confidence and your income are directly related... https://youtu.be/-vz7J1r41CU

This group is a community. A community of women who are building their confidence, supporting one another in their goals, dreams and aspirations. Come each month as we build relationships with one another, learn how to break through blocks, and transform from caterpillars into beautiful butterflies, so that we can all make a much bigger impact in the world, together.

Join the Confident Woman Community on Facebook at https://www.facebook.com/groups/confidencewomenentrepreneurs

I look forward to connecting with you!

With Purpose and Passion,

Erin Summ

www.erinsumm.com

Grab the FREE Report, 7 Secrets to Lasting Confidence for More Clients and Money in the Bank here... www.erinsumm.com/7Secrets

Join the FREE Stand Up and SHINE Confidence Challenge on Facebook here... https://www.facebook.com/groups/shineconfidencechallenge

Get the Stand Up and SHINE 60-Day Confidence Discovery Journal here... bit.ly/standandshine

name: Silicon Valley WITI Meetup Group
description:
The WITI Silicon Valley meetup group is for professional women who consider technology central to their businesses, careers and professions. WITI Networks provide amazing connections, resources and opportunities - all in a supportive environment that includes men who champion WITI's mission.

WITI's mission is to empower women worldwide to achieve unimagined possibilities and transformations through technology, leadership and economic prosperity.

WITI is the premier global organization helping tech-savvy women attain their professional goals. With a global network of smart, talented women & a market reach exceeding 2 million, WITI has established powerful strategic alliances and programs to provide connections, resources, & opportunities within a supportive environment of women committed to helping each other. WITI's mission is to empower women worldwide to achieve unimagined possibilities and transformations through technology, leadership and economic prosperity.

name: Asian Ladies Social Group
description: Are you an Asian female in your 30s - 40s living in South Bay and looking for more girlfriends to hangout with during the weekend? If so join us! We'll do brunches, lunches, dim sums etc...

name: ExpressSING in Marin!
description: Are you a woman with vocal chords? Then this group may be for you! We are dedicated to creating a safe and harmonious atmosphere for vocal exploration and expressSING! From improvisation to 'actual' songs, allow yourself to be IMPERFECT, make MISTAKES, and show up however you want to. Be seen and heard in a loving environment! Shy hidden singers or Broadway professionals welcome :) We facilitate Womens singing circles as well as jam sessions and workshops.

name: Movement Medicine
description:
Let's Move!  

Thank you for joining.  We are Movement Medicine now - a Movement to build REAL LIVE community in Santa Cruz through dance, movement, mindful self-care and lots of fun!  Please join the email newsletter for all the details of our LIVE events.

Currently there is once monthly Dance in Santa Cruz and 1-on-1 possibilities, with aspirations to expand in the coming year to other locations.

Join us here to ensure you are always up-to-date: http://eepurl.com/bJWFCrOn 

Fb: Movement Medicine
On TW: @Play4Wellness
On Pinterest: Holli Christine McCormick

You can even schedule a Flash Dance Mob where I bring the music set-up, the energy and the love - and you gather your friends to stir up a park, a workplace or any where else you can think of! Think of it as an Adult Recess break. There are no steps to remember, no commitment, no set schedules, no need to even know how to dance.  Yes, this is an experiment in OPEN possibilities that begin with "no".

If you have a heart beat, you have a rhythm that will show you how to move. All levels welcome...whether that is tapping your toes, clapping your hands, swinging your arms or shimming your booty!

So open your heart to the sky and put your Souls on the ground, or vice versa. 

Let's get Movin'!

name: discoverHER: Santa Cruz Socialites
description:
Our Mission: discoverHER

To build a resource hub for all women across Santa Cruz to discover, inspire & celebrate... together.

Our Story: Building Community

Santa Cruz Socialites: discoverHER.life exists because we saw the need to create a society of women whose network and friendships could naturally cultivate relationships, a place where authentic conversations take place and your guard can be down. Our goal is to spark bonds between women who are unlikely to know each other and plant the seed of community.

Santa Cruz Socialites, now: discoverHER.life , the resource hub for all women across Santa Cruz to discover, inspire & celebrate together. From the Household Director, Stay-at-Home-Mom, the Solopreneur, to the Corporate Executive and the Retiree. With a Women in Business: discoverHER directory, events and resources. We are the community and platform to support you in business and in life.

https://discoverher.life/

name: Girl Develop It San Jose
description:
Women Developers and Programmers!
Want to learn how to code? Have a great idea? Don't be shy. Develop it.


It can be intimidating for women to learn and ask questions when they are in an extreme minority. While open and welcoming, today's budding developer community is up to 91% male. There isn't a comfortable place where women can learn at their own pace and not be afraid to ask "stupid questions."


We decided it was time to provide a place where all questions are OK and everyone can learn in a supportive environment. Our courses focus on coding, leveraging existing technology, and having something to show for it (aka building sweet websites).


Stay tuned to this meetup for upcoming scheduled classes.

name: Soroptimists of the San Ramon Valley
description: Soroptimist International is a global volunteer movement working together to transform the lives of women and girls.Our network of around 80,000 club members in 130 countries and territories works at a local, national and international level to educate, empower and enable opportunities for women and girls. This Meetup is for women in the San Ramon Valley area.

name: Women's Connection Circle -Livermore - Share-Care-Grow
description:
Stay tuned!

A circle for women to SHARE herself (be seen) in a safe container, CARE (support other women) and 

GROW herself to be the best person she can be.

name: Health and Beauty Interest
description:
Ladies~ My mission is to help inspire and empower others to live out their best life! This group is for women who want to take charge of their wellness from the inside out. Nutrition to makeup and everything inbetween. Through education, support, and open minds we envision enriching your knowledge about your body, mind and spirit.

This group is for you!  This is a group for anyone who wants to make some long lasting friendships and learn about healthy living and just have some fun together! This group is for anyone who is an avid health enthusiast to someone who is just starting their healthy living journey..or not even quite there yet, but wants to meet some great women! Come and network with like minded powerful, and FUN women!

name: Girls Can Hack
description: This is a group for women interested in technology in general and Cyber Security in particular. No experience is needed. Let's get together and share our thoughts, knowledge , curiosity and projects. Let's hack.

name: Folsom Women Get Inspired While Walking
description:
Get mentoring and kick-butt Inspiration in this meetup group! If you are ready to make positive changes in your life, this is the group for you.  My name is Cynthia Bazin and I am the owner of SmartChic! www.smartchic.me.  As a motivational speaker and mentor, I am known to help people get laser-focused to step into their greatest life.  Get empowered and inspired by me!!! 

As part of the meetups, I will introduce you to the SmartChic Inner Circle Women's Membership that I have www.smartchic.me/inner-circle.  

**New members must include a clear head shot photo so we can recognize who you are at the meetups! Also, for new members, I will be requiring first and last name**

Always be sure to RSVP for an event you will be attending and check Meetup the morning of the event in case there are any changes!  

I am excited to meet all of you. Let's make 2016 our BEST year!!!! -Cynthia :)

name: Tarot, Astrology and More!
description: If you are interested in Tarot, Runes, Astrology and Oracles, join us for our evenings of exploration and discussion. A place to learn about these tools as well as ourselves. Join us!

name: Midwives for Women
description: Led by Renee Hanevold, APN, CNM, Midwives for Women is a Meetup for the birth and women's health community in Sacramento. Midwives for Women is a neutral forum for women and like-minded professionals to Meetup to share education and ideas for families, women and children.

name: SmartChic! Mentoring, Inspiration And Support For Women
description:
Get mentoring and kick-butt Inspiration in this meetup group! If you are ready to make positive changes in your life, this is the group for you.  My name is Cynthia Bazin and I am the owner of SmartChic! www.smartchic.me.  As a motivational speaker and mentor, I am known to help people get laser-focused to step into their greatest life.  Get empowered and inspired by me!!! 

As part of the meetups, I will introduce you to the SmartChic Inner Circle Women's Membership that I have www.smartchic.me/inner-circle. 

**New members must include a clear head shot photo so we can recognize who you are at the meetups! Also, for new members, I will be requiring first and last name**

Always be sure to RSVP for an event you will be attending and check Meetup the morning of the event in case there are any changes!  

I am excited to meet all of you. Let's make 2016 our BEST year!!!! -Cynthia :)

name: Dining For Women - Chapter of Monterey
description:
Dining for Women is a giving circle. Through our members' combined dinner donations, we fund international programs for women living in extreme poverty. By educating our members about the circumstances of women in some of the poorest countries in the world, our members become agents of change. Our Mission is to empower women and girls living in extreme poverty by funding programs that foster good health, education, and economic self-sufficiency.

We invite you to share in this life-changing group and to pass this information along to friends and family. Please bring a potluck dish to share. We "dine in" and the money we would have spent "dining out" is donated to the organizations Dining for Women has carefully researched and qualified. We, in turn, empower the lives of women and their families around the world. For more information, go to: diningforwomen.org

.

name: Women Partnering in Business East Bay
description: Please join us as we collaborate and create dynamic business partnerships between professional women in the San Francisco East Bay region. Our goal is to form business partnerships by sharing and supporting other women business owners and professionals in our community. Our group is not category specific, nor are there monthly attendance requirements. However, we do ask that you come to our events not only to expand your own business but also to help grow the businesses of the other attendees. We will alternate between lunch events and evening happy hours.  At the lunches, there will be time for networking and everyone will have a short time to introduce yourself and your business. The evening events are an informal time to get to know each other and our businesses in a less structured format. Please bring business cards, flyers or any other promotional materials you wish to either event.

name: Support Group for Women with Pelvic Pain, SF East Bay
description:
Suffering from pelvic pain? 

I get it. I suffered from Vaginismus, one cause of Pelvic Pain for over 20 years. About five years ago, I experienced a remarkable healing around my sexuality, and completely healed the Vaginismus in a very unusual and pleasurable way in 6 weeks!

After that, I began a mission to help other women with pelvic pain issues.  This support group is a place for women with pelvic pain issues to come together, share resources, and get guidance on how to heal.

I hope to see you at one of our Meetups soon!

Warmly,

Sarah

name: Write/Speak/Code SF
description:
Write/Speak/Code is on a mission to increase the visibility and leadership of SF women and non-binary coders* through thought leadership, conference speaking, open source, self-care, career mentorship and more.


We define coders as anyone who has written a line of code and can explain what it does, including developers, designers, data scientists, e-book publishers, and more.

All attendees, speakers, mentors, etc., are expected to abide by the Write/Speak/Code Code of Conduct. 

Want to support this Meetup? We have a patreon page here 

Know somebody who would like to sponsor us? We're looking for sponsors for our Meetups, workshops and conference! Contact one of the organizers to get more information.

name: Embodied Voice for Relationships
description:
If you want more depth in your relationships, this is the right group for you. Whether you are in a partnership right now or you're single, come and learn how to create an even deeper level of intimacy in all the relationships in your life. This includes professional relationships, friendships, family dynamics and anything in between. 

The cornerstone to every relationship is communication and communication starts by using your voice to communicate your needs and desires. The problem is, most people don't know how to use their voice effectively, so even when you say exactly what you want, your partner doesn't hear you. Frustrating when that happens, isn't it? What would it be like if you could communicate your desires clearly and effectively and have your partner fulfill those desires? That is not only possible, we're here to show you how you can create this reality in your life.

Learning to speak from your body allows you not only to be heard - you will be felt in a way you have probably never experienced before. Learn how to use your voice to attract and keep the relationships you desire in your life. Find your authentic voice, and notice how much different it sounds than the way you currently sound when you speak. Feel the power of your own voice in a way you have yet to experience. Isn't it time for you to create the amazing relationships you have always wanted? Join us, and make these dreams a reality.

name: Davis Women seeking new women friends
description:
I started this in 2015 because my last two friends living in California and Davis moved out of town, and I found myself looking for friends not just to do things with, but also to sometimes have serious conversations about topics of import to our country, our world, our families and to our inner selves. 

This group is not about specific activities, but about activities as a way to interact with other women.  Sometimes this leads to personal friendships outside the group, and sometimes it's just about a get-together with other women.  But EVERY meeting so far has been a GREAT TIME.   We do have lots of brainiacs, but we have plenty of regular people to keep us balanced.  There is a strong contingent of younger women, a good number of women with children in school and number of us are empty nesters. 

This should go without saying, but intolerance and back-biting is absolutely unacceptable.  If you don't like someone, keep it to yourself.  If you don't like an entire group of people, such as Jews or African Americans, then this isn't the right place for you.  You don't have to be a Liberal, but you do have to be willing to take each woman as an individual, and not judge her based on her race, religion, etc. 

This is group is strictly for women who live in Davis, or who work a regular Davis job with a Davis address.  (If you live elsewhere, why not start a group yourself?  It's easy!)

All new members are asked to come to a get together within their first three months, plan a get together within their first three months, or contribute toward the cost of maintaining the group, which I personally pay for out of my (very lean) pocket.

We all look forward to meeting you soon!

Best wishes,

Alex

name: Mentoring Women in Tech
description: We aim to help women enter and grow in the tech industry. We'll feature leaders from Silicon Valley to share their growth stories. There will be opportunities to network with professionals in the tech industry. Most importantly we hope to inspire women and help them with professional advice.

name: Womens Fairfax Singing Meetup
description: Are you a woman with vocal chords? Then this group may be for you! We are dedicated to creating a safe and harmonious atmosphere for vocal exploration and expressSING! From improvisation to 'actual' songs, allow yourself to be IMPERFECT, make MISTAKES, and show up however you want to. Be seen and heard in a loving environment! Shy hidden singers or Broadway professionals welcome :) We facilitate open Womens singing circles as well as closed singing groups. Come SING!

name: Reclaim Your Voice!
description: Are you an aspiring singer who wants to share your message with the world but are held back by limiting beliefs? I've been there and its no fun! This is a space dedicated to helping you explore the blocks instead of keep them hidden. Who knows what gems you may uncover?

name: Dating the French Way
description:
This group welcome powerful women and brave men who are willing to be vulnerable and get to know each other in a safe environment. It's for those who want to simply hang out, have a good time, go out for a walk, a drink or go dancing and enjoy a moment among friends. A network support and a dating group for the 40+. A fun group with a French accent. Oh, la la ! 

Welcoming predominantly women for the girl love power and Gentlemen welcomed because we love them <3

Open to every faith, belief, religion, color, gender, sexual orientation as long as it's based on love and respect.

name: Women's Sacred Circles Oakland, CA
description:
Women's Sacred Circles Oakland, CA

Overview:

Women's Sacred Circles in Oakland, CA is a meet-up group that empowers Heart-Centered Women in the Bay Area to Connect with a Supportive Sisterhood, Explore Sacred Feminine and Plant Medicine Ways, and Discover Your True Calling.

Our philosophy is based on the Dalai Lama's statement that "The world will be saved by the Western Woman." Now is the time to step up and claim your throne, your place in this sacred circle of sisters. 

We gather on the second Saturday of each month in a sacred ceremony to create community and support women who are curious about Deepening your Spirituality, Exploring Sacred Feminine & Plant Medicine, and connecting with a Like-Hearted, Safe and Supportive Sisterhood. Along with monthly opportunities to tune in, get inspired, connect and safely share what's REAL, we have a topic discussion and a mastermind forum for staying connected with the other sisters. There may be occasional guest presenters. TELL US WHAT YOU WANT! We LISTEN <3

Our Mission:

To empower heart-centered women to take ownership of your future, deepen your spirituality, safely explore Sacred Feminine and Plant Medicine, and build your community of like-hearted sisters.

Our meet-up accomplishes this by giving you powerful tools and practices that will expand your consciousness and awaken your spirituality, tap into your feminine power and wisdom, and offers support throughout your journey with the Sacred Feminine and Plant Medicine Ways.

WARNING: This group is for heart-centered women who are really serious about stepping outside your comfort zone so you can live a better life, explore the Sacred Feminine and Plant Medicine ways with respect, and invest in co-creating a safe, supportive sisterhood that will support you through your difficult challenges and celebrate with you through your triumphs.

This is a group for heart-centered women who feel like there is MORE TO LIFE than the mundane world has to offer and are ready to explore what truly nourishes YOUR SOUL as a SPIRIT in human skin.

If you are a little outside the box, spiritual, sassy, fed up with dogma and "transformational workshops" that leave you disappointed, and you're finally ready to step up into your highest calling, this group is for you.

You'll leave each ceremony remembering your true, authentic, and untamed wild woman and know how to keep her alive and strong while you navigate being a Queen, Priestess, Superstar in a world full of "muggles."

name: Sacred Sisterhood Circles Oakland
description:
Sacred Sisterhood Circles Oakland

Overview:

Sacred Sisterhood Circles Oakland is a meetup group that helps women in the Bay Area to bring more meaning into their life, discover their true purpose, and deepen their connection in all of their relationships. You'll learn how to attract healthy relationships and the sacred feminine principles of success.

Our belief is that every woman deserves to be a part of a safe and supportive sisterhood. And our passion is helping you to connect with your own unique Source of feminine wisdom and strength without religious or even spiritual templates. We empower you to access your higher Self through sacred ceremony and ritual that are based in prayer and deep self-compassion.

We hold ceremony once a month [usually 2nd Saturday in Oakland] to create a safe and supportive community and to help women to feel empowered to live your purpose, enjoy deep and meaningful relationships and thrive in your health and business. 

Our Mission:

To empower women to full awaken their sacred feminine, to live a life of purpose, to attract healthy and vibrant relationships, and to share your gifts with the world.

Our meet-up accomplishes this by giving you powerful experiences that shift old limiting beliefs and expands your consciousness to see what you're truly capable of.

WARNING: This group is for women who are really serious about showing up for themselves and their sisters. This group if for women who are willing to DO the work that breaks them out of old stuck patterns that are wearing them out and keeping them from joy, love and LIFE. This group is not for the feint of heart. For those of you who apply to join, make sure you are ready to learn, grow, and invest in yourself by applying the principles of the Sacred Sisterhood.

This is a group for women who feel like they're dying on the inside because their gifts are going to waste or they can't seem to manifest a healthy, loving relationship.

If you are open to NEW experiences, want to connect with other like-hearted sisters and ready to grow in deep and challenging ways, this group is for you.

You'll go away with helpful resources for navigating the unexpected twists and turns life throws your way and connections (real life ones) to help support you through tough times.

name: Women Entrepreneurs in Bloom~ ElCerrito,CA
description:
Women Entrepreneurs in Bloom is a community of women artists, coaches, healers and creative entrepreneurs who want to get their work out there in a bigger way, while remaining true to their values and becoming profitable. This is a community of soulful women who want to connect more deeply to their feminine power and with other women, so they can continue to take courageous and inspired steps in their life and business. Come join us and get ready to Bloom Into You!

There is a quiz you can take which determines Your Unique Sacred Money Archetype (this is the way you relate to money). It's a powerful tool I use with clients to support you in empowering your money conversation. Here is a link to take the quiz---> http://bloomintoyou.com/takequiz/ <br>

I look forward to seeing you at our monthly Business Women in Bloom events! Please feel free to share with the women in your life. Look for us on Facebook.

https://www.facebook.com/BloomIntoYou

Please RSVP space is limited.

Kadidja Yansane is a Business Coach who works with clients to own their value, charge their worth and get paid to do what they love through private coaching, classes and women's circles. Schedule your one-on-one complimentary 60 minute Discovery Session (valued at $400) with me by going to http://bloomintoyou.com/now/

Call, text or email me if you have any questions. <br>

Kadidja at (310) 924-0687 <br>

email kadidja@bloomintoyou.com

http://www.bloomintoyou.com <br>

name: Sisters of the Southbay (SoS)
description: Group for Sister Queens of all ethnic background to come together for fun and sisterhood.  We are women that need to start building a future and breaking down walls.

name: Successful Women of Central Valley Networking Mixers
description:
We are a group of local women dedicated to empowering, inspiring, networking, supporting and assisting women in the Central Valley. We believe in and support the "Whole Woman" recognizing that there are many facets of our lives and many levels to connect with other women in our community. Our desire is to create a welcoming environment where we can all realize our goals personally, professionally, and socially in our community.

www.SWCV.org

name: SF Conscious Women's Group ( in their 20's, 30's, & 40's)
description: This is a group for Women of the San Francisco Bay Area to join together, connect, support one another, have fun, learn and create a community of like-minded soul sisters.   This group is meant to bring together women of like mindedness and soul so that we can connect, bond and share our passions and internal worlds with each other with love, acceptance, and gratitude. We'll meet at least once a month to do fun activities like hike, go to the beach, have picnics, take classes and play! Let's create a community of conscious, spiritual, holistic, healthy women to meet one another, make connections, share, learn and grow together! Life is better when you have a strong female support and presence in your life. Can't wait to meet all of you wonderful loving women! This group is for young women in their 20's, 30's and 40's.

name: Woven: Marin Women Connecting Meetup
description: If you crave the company of other women... if you want meaningful connection and support... if you seek a more balanced, purposeful, joyful and healthy life... if you get excited by the idea of laughter and a good time with like-minded women... if you get goosebumps by the concept of creating positive change in the world -- than join us! We want to create a local community of women to share wisdom, stories and support.

name: Woven: San Francisco Women Connecting Meetup
description:
If you crave the company of other women... if you want meaningful connection and support... if you seek a more balanced, purposeful, joyful and healthy life... if you get excited by the idea of laughter and a good time with like-minded women... if you get goosebumps by the concept of creating positive change in the world -- than join us! We want to create a local community of women to share wisdom, stories and support.

Check us out at www.wovenweb.com or https://www.facebook.com/wovenweb

name: River Area Gals Society
description: River Area Gals meet once a month to connect, socialize and have fun. No Judgement, No Agenda, Just Laughs is our motto. A social group for women and their friends to gather at local establishments in the Russian River Area.

name: LIMINAL
description:
LIMINAL is a feminist writing space located in Oakland. We host writing workshops & events of all kinds. All types of writers are welcome. Feminism is self-defined and individual. We believe in promoting each other, making money off of your art and using writing as a way to have a voice. www.theliminalcenter.com 

www.facebook.com/theliminalcenter.

name: Women In Growth Marketing (San Francisco)
description:
Women in Growth Marketing is a community of women and men learning from experts in Growth at startups and supporting women as they build their presence in the world of Growth. 

We spotlight accomplished women working in our field, giving them a platform to share their knowledge and inspire other women building their careers in growth. 

Men are welcome to join the group too!

name: Skin Care & Wellness Meetup
description:
Seeing is believing, we will invite skin care and wellness expert on regular basis to share skin care / wellness tips, and do demos and offer free skin care / wellness service ...etc!

Come and join us, meet with other ladies, and get educated about the knowledge which will help you to stay young and beautify!

name: Women's Empowerment Movement Meetup
description: This is a group dedicated to inspiring and leading women to live in their life purposes, be grounded in their self-worth, and join in raising the consciousness of the planet. Meetings will include inspirational talks, networking, social gathering, support, and all out fun.

name: World Changing Women
description:
This is for you if you're a savvy sistah, an interesting entrepreneur, a visionary vixen and an action takin' Aphrodite ;) This is a meet up for Bay Area women (and friends) who are looking to connect, collaborate, and take their dreams out of their heads and bring them into the world. As a dreamer, being stuck alone in your head too long can be a dangerous place to dwell. By getting out amongst a like-minded support group, you'll be manifesting your dreams faster than you can say "vision board"! Come join the fun!

I also invite you to join the emerging community on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/groups/wcwsss/

name: Business Women's Community, Campbell (AKA Savvy Sassy Women)
description:
Business Women's Community, Campbell (AKA Savvy Sassy Women) is here to encourage business women to get to know each other on a higher level to create a strong foundation for networking, referral business and professional development in efforts to support each other at the same time!!! 

Let's make some connections, improve our business, make new friends and most of all HAVE FUN!!!!!

name: Great Girlfriends (30's and 40's)
description:
Welcome!  

This is a group for women who want to get together and make new friends with other wonderful, smart, positive and strong women. Please join this group if you are a female professional living in San Francisco and are love eating, enjoy cultural experiences, being active and are committed to making new, healthy relationships. 

This group is inclusive, inviting and warm, with the goal to make friendships that last beyond the confines of a meetup group. We'll talk about real issues, build relationships by doing things together (note: eat, explore, be active, etc.) and celebrate our successes and experiences. 

We'll be organizing smaller group events so everyone can have the chance to connect and get to know each other. This group is going to remain small and personable. 

We welcome your feedback and suggestions for new activities, restaurants to try and get-togethers. 

Please respect this group by only RSVP'ing if you are able to show up. A reminder email will be sent out 24 hours before the event to confirm your attendance. A no-show (without an email / text with a valid reason) and you will be removed from the group. No flakiness, please :) 

Also, you need to please have a picture with your face visible and a first name in order to join the group. 

Looking forward to meeting you and making new, strong female friendships. 

Jules & Robin

name: Thriving Women in Business Group
description: This group is for you if you are a positive, ambitious woman entrepreneur who wants to use your business as a way to serve others and you want to massively monetize your mastery in the process. If you know the power of a community of like-minded women, if you run your business with integrity, generosity and a desire to support other women in business, if you believe there is plenty of business for everyone, then this group is for you. This group is hosted by Caterina Rando, founder of the Thriving Women in Business Community. She hosts over 90 days or events and trainings for women in business each year and is a sought-after-speaker and well-regarded mentor to women entrepreneurs who want to catapult their businesses while uplifting others. To find out more about Caterina visit www.caterinarando.com and get your free subscription to Thriving Women in Business Magazine at www.twibc.com.

name: FEMININE PROSPERITY Meetup Group
description:
Hello Ladies,

I created this group because I have found that women thrive when they are an integral part of a loving, supportive, emotionally healthy community.

We've heard many spiritual teachers, and now scientists as well, telling us that we really do create our own reality. But we have been programmed from our earliest years with lies about who we are and what we are capable of doing and being. In order to reverse that programming from our parents, our schools, our media and our entire society, we need a lot of support. We need a community consisting of loving people who take 100% responsibility for their lives and challenge you to do the same. We need a clear system to follow which teaches us how to dance with the Law of Attraction in a way that really works. Through exciting, transformational events, supportive meetings and fun activities, we are committed to keeping our vibration HIGH as much of the time as possible. Feeling wonderful, laughing, loving, creating ordinary miracles attracts more of the same! Come join us on our wild joyride!

If you'd like to understand what I mean by "Feminine Prosperity," 

see this website: https://about.me/caliwaysumati

name: Make Money Doing What You Love
description: Our group is for professional women and men launching or building a business based on your purpose, passion and greatest gifts. You will learn strategies, tools and practices for clarifying your goals, increasing your income, your impact and satisfaction. Our events will help you resolve your present challenges and get support for realizing your life vision.

name: Craft Your Ideal Business
description: Our group is for professional women and men launching or building a business based on your purpose, passion and greatest gifts. You will learn strategies, tools and practices for clarifying your goals, increasing your income as well as your impact, contribution and satisfaction. Our events will help you resolve your present challenges and get support for realizing your life vision.

name: Profit From Your Passion and Genius
description: Our group is for professional women and men launching or building a business based on your purpose, passion and greatest gifts. You will learn strategies, tools and practices for clarifying your goals, increasing your income as well as your impact, contribution and satisfaction. Our events will help you resolve your present challenges and get support for realizing your life vision.

name: National Association of Women Property Investors-Oakland/SF
description:
National Association of Women Property Investors(NAWPI) group is built on the belief that we together can inspire women to develop wealth, wisdom and leadership nationwide through support, education and property investing. Local women's real estate investing group to help support and teach others to gain financial literacy and freedom.

(Men are also welcome).

name: Woven: East Bay Women Connecting Meetup
description:
If you crave the company of other women... if you want meaningful connection and support... if you seek a more balanced, purposeful, joyful and healthy life... if you get excited by the idea of laughter and a good time with like-minded women... if you get goosebumps by the concept of creating positive change in the world -- than join us! We want to create a local community of women to share wisdom, stories and support.

Check us out at www.wovenweb.com or https://www.facebook.com/wovenweb

name: Sant Cruz Women's Leadership Circle
description:
If you crave the company of other women... if you want meaningful connection and support... if you seek a more balanced, purposeful, joyful and healthy life... if you get excited by the idea of laughter and a good time with like-minded women... if you get goosebumps by the concept of creating positive change in the world -- then join us!

We are creating a local community of women to network, share insights, explore the potential of our purpose, share wisdom, and learn the value and skills of conscious leadership.

name: Wise Women Awakening : A Path to Peace & Personal Power!
description:
Are you hearing the call of the  Divine Feminine awakening?  Do you yearn to have more inner peace, personal power, passion and Play?  Are you ready to transform obstacles and create a Life you Love?  

 You are welcome to our circle of amazing supportive women !

Every month we explore different themes regarding Women's Empowerment: 

Intuition Activation, Chakra & Energy Tools, Speaking our Truth, learning to navigate through our Emotional Landscape, Healing the inner child, Divination Card Readings, Honoring the Seasons with Ceremony and more! 

It is time to retire the Martyr who live in overwhelm and welcome in Sophia, the Goddess of Wisdom, who  inspires and empowers us to consciously create a more balanced life in Work, Rest and Play. 

Welcome more energy, clarity, confidence as you awaken your Wise Woman!   It's time to say YES to you!

name: Point Richmond Women's Divorce/Separation Support Circle
description: This group is for ladies who have experienced an end to a relationship or are considering doing so.  You feel lost and afraid.   The transition from being part of a couple to being alone is huge. Some days it may feel difficult to simply survive. Join this group in order to feel alive again.  This meeting is open to all relationship styles. Together we will grow, heal and begin to thrive in ways like never before. As we heal our hearts of loss and pain we find an inner beauty that sets us free to live a life filled with hope, love and joy. This may be happening to you but it is NOT who you are.   I look forward to meeting you!!

name: Girls in Tech
description: Girls in Tech is a social network enterprise focused on the engagement, education and empowerment of like-minded, professional, intelligent and influential women in technology. As young women with the capacity to inspire, we made it our personal desire and passion to create and sustain an organization that focuses on the collaboration, promotion, growth and success of women in the technology sector.

name: Creative Genius SF: Women Changemakers
description:
Creative Genius unites brilliant women change makers from around the San Francisco Bay Area. Creative Genius events provide movement, self-development, transformation, breakthroughs, an experience for your senses, community, nourishment for the soul, and new friendships!

This is a place to re-ignite your wildness, creativity, and your deep heart wisdom. A place for you to reconnect to yourSelf because maybe the path of "success" has trapped you in a box that drains your spirit. You know you are here for a greater purpose and want to stay creative, impactful, and connected! You want to be a change maker but the world or your work life has begun to beat the creativity out of you.. 

This is a place for your voice to be heard, seen, celebrated, relax, play, and ignite your strengths & gifts that the world desperately needs from you. This is a safe place for women change makers to unlock their greatness! A place to activate her genius, uplift her mood, and energy so she can be the most brave, beautiful, badass leader of her life! 

We welcome all women of all color, race, background, sexual orientation, spiritual practice, experience, and our trans sisters to come play at our Creative Genius playground every last Thursday of the month!

name: Bold Pep Talk
description:
Bold Pep Talk - Meet Up is designed to support women in transition and families who want to connect through creativity.

There are various Bold Pep Talk events that geared toward business women, wellness, and creativity.

Bold Ladies' Night Out

Bold Dinner Party

Creativity Summit

Business Learning Lab for Creative Womenpreneurs


Join us to meet new people, support your goals, get some relief from being over-stretched, get access to tools to instantly upgrade your situation, and have fun with those you love the most.


Kanesha Baynard is a life coach and author supporting people in transition. She is the founder the Bold Living Today community to help people create the lives they want based on their core desires. She is also an expert on multigenerational households and in-law dynamics. Kanesha's work has been featured in Fast Company, HuffPost Live, U.S. News and World Report, Martha Beck's Real Coaches, Real Stories, and the Chicago Tribune.

name: Opening the LOTUS ~ Women's Sexual Empowerment Circles
description:
Opening the LOTUS ~ Women's Sexual Empowerment Circles are for women who want a safe, shame-free space to discuss sexuality.  We share our stories, gain strength from each other, learn about our bodies, discuss orgasm, sexual preferences, sexual styles, body image, sexual shame & trauma, and heal any wounds we may have around our sexual experiences.  We will gain insight from HomePlay exercises specifically designed to empower us as women on this transformational journey.

LOTUS blooms as:

Loving Ourselves Fully

Opening to Orgasm

Trusting Our Authentic Expressions

Union with Self, Beloved & Divine

Surrendering to Satisfaction

In Opening the LOTUS circles we explore each one of these themes through story telling, group activities, diad work, online instruction and sex education.

The Lotus Flower has long been used in eastern spirituality to symbolize female sexuality.   

Taken from mythencyclopedia.com

"In Asian mythology the lotus often symbolizes the female sexual organs, from which new life is born. Lotuses appear in both Hindu and Buddhist mythology. Hindus refer to the god Brahma as "lotus-born " for he is said to have emerged from a lotus that was the navel, or center, of the universe. The lotus is also the symbol of the goddess Padma, who appears on both Hindu and Buddhist monuments as a creative force.

The holiness of the flower is illustrated by the legend that when the Buddha walked on the earth he left lotuses in his trail instead of footprints. One myth about the origin of Buddha relates that he first appeared floating on a lotus. According to a Japanese legend, the mother of Nichiren (Lotus of the Sun) became pregnant by dreaming of sunshine on a lotus. Nichirin founded a branch of Buddhism in the 1200s. The phrase "Om mani padme hum," which both Hindus and Buddhists use in meditation, means "the jewel in the lotus" and can refer to the Buddha or to the mystical union of male and female energies".

Opening the LOTUS as Love, Orgasm, Trust, Union & Surrender encourages us as women to step into our full, authentic, freely expressed sexual selves.

For more information about my Sex Education & Counseling practice please go to:

TeachMeAboutSex.com

I look forward to meeting you!

Anya

name: Mona Lisa's Smile
description: Do you actually enjoy sex or want to? Are you ready to own your sexuality? Reclaim it, heal it and celebrate it? Women need a safe space in which to heal, explore, examine and learn about their sexuality. This is a group for women to talk openly and freely about women's sexuality, sexual exploration, shaking up the social norms, and ignoring social taboos. So much of our popular culture is built on the idea that sex is for men. That men are the pursuers of sex, and women are the prize to be had. That women only "give up" sex to men in exchange for love and commitment, and that women who give it up too easily are, at best, fools who don't know how to broker good deals for ourselves. The idea of women as the sexual gatekeepers, the natural wielders of "no," is so strongly embedded in our culture that women who enthusiastically say "yes!" because we actually like sex are profoundly threatening.

name: Opportunity to diversify: Women entrepreneurs
description: I am a busy professional working on a business opportunity in my spare-time. Connected with a team of other entrepreneurs who are really successful in their business and personal lives. I am looking out for like-minded individuals who want to use their spare time to do something productive, networking with other professionals, learn and grow as an entrepreneur.

name: Hack-hers*
description: Hack-hers* (formerly Underrepresented && Nontraditional) is a joint alumni association for all underrepresented genders (all women and nonbinary genders included) who graduated from bootcamps in San Francisco. Our goal is to connect and promote underrepresented genders in technology, provide a supportive environment, and to network and socialize through happy hours, talks, hackathons, and recruiting events.

name: Gutsy & Gorgeous in the East Bay Area
description:
This is a group for women who see value in taking care of themselves, living a life with no regrets, and letting their their inner badass shine! I'll post adventures, events, and programs that focus on nurturing personal growth, relationships, and health & fitness. 

We believe in showing up as you are, that play isn't just for kids, that we all still have a lot to learn, that when we move - we can move mountains, that it really does take a village, and that nothing can replace the feeling of connecting with women who really see you.

Note: If you do not have a profile picture or are a male (sorry, this group is just for the gals), you will be removed. It's all love and our goal is to cultivate a culture of safety. Thank you for understanding.

name: Create The Life and Business You Love
description:
Create the life and business you really love. Inspiring heart centred professionals to stand up and shine. No more stressed out, burned out, bored or brain dead.

As a coach, and meditation instructor who has given thousands of 1-on-1 sessions to private clients and run many groups around the world, I find that many professionals that I work with, have anxiety about going out alone, they need to define their authentic leadership role, and they have difficulty trusting they are choosing the right path for them.

What they really want is a JOYFUL LIFE doing something they really LOVE.

name: Bay Area Conscious Feminine Entrepreneurs
description: We are powerful women on a mission to share our gifts in the most authentic way and create lasting change and increase consciousness. Creating, managing and running your own business can be daunting and time consuming, not to mention lonely and often overwhelming. This group was created to help educate, engage and surround each of us with like- minded and inspired feminine energy and expertise. We have bold entrepreneurs looking to share their gifts and help you grow. This is a community of empowered, driven women looking to grow your business, feed your mind and create lasting relationships of support and community.

name: Love & Dating in the Age of the App
description:
This group is for San Francisco and Bay Area singles looking for long term relationships, but who can't seem to make heads or tails out of the scene. 

These events are a place for you to discus dating culture, and find new ways of looking at yourself, and at your dating pool. 

Don't lose hope! Gain new perspective, new knowledge, and new skills to find, recognize, and keep the kind of person you have been looking for all along.

name: Bay Area ReBoot Accelerator for Women
description:
ReBoot Accel gets women current, connected, and confident to reenter the workforce or pivot to new careers. 

Who should join: We welcome all women, whether looking to reenter the workforce after pausing their careers, pivoting to new careers, starting businesses, currently working, or in discernment about "what's next."

Why should you join: It's more fun to learn together and know you're not the only one who's tech and professional skills could use a ReBoot too. We provide a safe and fun learning community. And connections to like-minded energized women, local career experts and resources, hiring employers, and job opportunities.

What can you expect:  Our ReBoot Connect membership program meets in person at least twice a month. We also offer longer term courses that focus on improving your tech and job search skills, like learning how to collaborate with the Google Suite, maximize LinkedIn for your job search, and build a personal and business brand through social media.

Community: Core to our mission is the importance of connections & community. We foster a strong sense of community through our membership program and our longer term courses. Connections are one of the most important pieces of finding a job, and we want to help you with just that.


Visit us at rebootaccel.com for more information.

name: Cryptocurrency, Blockchain & more (Bay Area)
description: Want to pitch what you're working on? Looking for co-founders? Need advice on pitching? Need development resources? Looking for investors? Interested in investing/working with Bitcoin startups?

name: Honoring Divine Feminine Attributes
description: Mother Earth, humanity, and all souls are going through a time of tremendous transformation. We are giving birth to a new era. In this time, more than any other in recorded history, it is vitally important to honor and respect Divine Feminine Attributes. We must reclaim the Divine Feminine within all people if we are to usher in a new era of love, peace and harmony.

name: Wimmin Awakening: A Spiritual & Holistic Growing Community
description:
A Spiritual and Holistic community of Wimmin leaving the Matrix and reconnecting deeply within ourselves, returning to our soul, and our soul's journey.

      We are trans-gender and non-transgender women of any and all orientations (lesbian, bisexual, pansexual, straight, queer, etc) learning about and sharing in personal growth and holistic culture and community. We are engaged in healing, growing and creating our right life, healthy culture, friends and family of choice.

In our culture, we are conditioned and programmed from birth with the script of the dominators of our culture. In this community we bond, grow, learn, unlearn, celebrate life. As a result of our conditioning from our society and our biological families, we act in ways and create a life that is counter to our own and our collective benefit. Through presentations, instruction, practices, video, creative expression, group exercises, healing practices, love, play, and emotion in safe created space, we will allow our spirit, our soul, our minds and our physical body to return to our essential state (to our essence) in connection to all (rather than in isolation). 
   When we speak of personal growth we are creating a life that is
    - More and more Conscious
     -Living a life toward Meaning
      - being Considerate of the effects our thoughts, emotions, choices and actions have on ourselves, others, the world
      -Acknowledging the connection between ourselves and everything everyone and everything that appears not us
      We are a group of women committed to taking an intentional journey of growth together, waking up, bonding, learning to love, making deep connection, real community, calling on one another, celebrating together and becoming a community. 
      Our Community Home is "Demeter's Magical Sanctuary": Healing rooms, educational center, nature retreat, holistic and spiritual lifestyle learning, community.      This community is for all those who self define as women. If you do not accept transgender, gender fluid or gender variant women, please do not attend our events. If you are open to all self defining women, even if you do not understand, then your inclusion is a possibility.
A phone conversation is required before a person attends their first event with us and no location will be posted online
          Also available: healing and awakening work, counseling, coaching and spiritual development sessions, apprenticing sensitives and healers,. 
      We reserve the right to remove any participant from our groups at our discretion. 
       To talk about this group you may reach us at 510-830-5836. 
       Event space is a home retreat surrounded by redwoods and other trees. It is a large home with large rooms, a huge private back, pool for watsu and water dance, hot tub, a large redwood deck and a 2nd floor deck. 
Who is Demeter?  Demeter is a female figure ubiquitous in cultures around the world. She creates safe space for all. She is the protector of those harmed or who would be harmed. She assists those on a difficult journey. She helps heal those who have been harmed. She also symbolizes the cycle of life and the hope of rebirth. Demeter gives hope to the rising of the soul and of a return to our souls journey when we stray off our truer path.
         Chriss is a trans two-spirit wommon, lifelong healer, teacher, mystic, culture healer and holistic culture shaper. Her gender shifts like the wind, and her spirit rises like the soul. She teaches groups, gives private healing sessions, counseling and coaching and apprenticeship for over 10 years. Testimonials provided on request. 
         Interested parties must call to discuss. There will be no drop-ins. 
       No shows get pushed to the bottom of future events and may be on a waiting list. 
       Decorum and agreements: 
       Respect for oneself and others. Consideration of others. Do what is true and right for oneself and do right by others. Camaraderie, support, love, growth and connection and community are our goals. We look to build someone up not tear them down. We will discuss shadow (or unhealthy patterns), but in a loving supportive manner, and we will practice healthy patterns. Personal antagonistic attack will not be tolerated. Each one teach one. Humility allows growth, defensiveness prevents it. Change is life and life is change. Embrace change and the ride may be more enjoyable. Flexibility allows more peace. A grateful heart may allow peace and happiness. Awareness of feelings allows choice instead of reaction.
Welcome.

name: The Women's Business Builders Club of Fairfield
description:
The purpose of this meet-up group is to provide networking opportunities for local small businesses. There will be trainings and guest speakers relating to growing your businesses and growing your networks. To keep things fresh & lively we will have different format's each meeting. This group will meet 1st & 3rd Tues & will include lunch will be $17. (includes beverage, tax & tip) 
Members will also be able to introduce themselves and their business. Please feel free to invite other potential members to this group. 

Our goal is to provide an Outstanding professional environment that is conducive to help growing your businesses.

name: Best for Women Soroptimist International of the Tri-Valley
description: Soroptimist International of the Tri-Valley is one of 1,300 clubs in 20 countries and territories who work to improve the lives of women and girls. Our devoted club members work to fund raise and volunteer locally in programs that support women and girls throughout Pleasanton, Dublin and Livermore.

name: Badass Boss Women of Santa Cruz
description:
Welcome to Badass Boss Women of Santa Cruz. 

We are a powerful group of women who are ready to leave the restraints of a J-O-B behind and become their own badass boss - growing their impact and income on their own terms! Is that YOU? Come join us! You might think of yourself as a solo-preneur but you are not alone! 

We're here to support you every step of the way to get out of overwhelm and into the luxurious experience of being your own badass boss!

This is a meet-up for women who are willing and ready to embrace all aspects of ourselves as we birth our businesses. To return to our essence in service to what wants to be born through us. Light. Dark. Fears. Desires. Vulnerabilities. Visions. Business is truly a spiritual path and you have to be a badass to navigate the wild ride!  We'll gather to remind ourselves that our visions are SO much bigger than our fears. Invite your sisters. Share the abundance.

name: Skateboarding classes in San Jose
description: Twelve years of skateboarding have given so much to me, and it is time to give back. After several requests, I am offering skateboarding lessons to the community. As a mental health professional, I know that learning a new physical activity always benefits one's mental health. Finally, skateboarding can be a dangerous sport, and it is all the more important to learn the right fundamentals in order to minimize risk of injury.

name: EBabes TGIF Meetup
description: About EBabe's: EBabe's is the 1st Friday of each month that gives Lesbian women from all over the Bay Area a chance to be part of a community of women after a long week; See old friends, make new ones, (and more if you are looking!). It's a social event with a community consciousness. EBabes teams up with non-profit/not for profit as well as Lesbian owned business and lesbian artists ...to lend a platform so they can share what services they have to offer as well as ask for what they need. Your hosts: Lynn, Jennifer & DB are at each event to welcome you and make sure that you have a good time! We look forward to seeing you! If you have questions contact Jennifer at 510.529.5147 or email: ebabestgif@gmail.com

name: Weight Loss Picnic
description: This meetup's purpose is to workout by walking in the woods or on the beach and then stop and have a break and snack on weight loss sustaining foods. Let's walk in the woods and talk about weight loss/exercise/health goals while we walk. We encourage each other in whatever our goals may be; weight loss, getting fit, healthier lifestyle etc...Come join us!

name: Wine, Women, and Wealth - San Ramon
description: We are building a community of women who want to have fun while learning to build and protect their wealth and share good wine.

name: Black Women Who Write Code
description: For Black Women who write code, either in their spare time or as a student or as a full-time gig, and want to meet up with other black women coders to write even more code and share ideas, stories and support!

name: Soul Sister Meetup
description: The purpose of soul sister meetings would be to gather women together to have a safe place to talk about the every day issues that we struggle and strive at. It would be a meeting of the minds on what it means to be a woman and how to inspire the best in all of us. Each meeting we will focus on a specific topic to add to our tool belt.

name: WOW! Women of Worth-Christian Women's Social Meetu
description: This is a group for woman of all ages that are wanting to grow and learn from one another, make new friends, share ideas, tips, etc. with each other. We have a variety of activities as we have all ages of women and professions. We have dinners, movie nights, hiking, kayaking, special events and speakers, cooking classes, craft days, and so much more!

name: Women Supporting Women Meetup
description:
https://goo.gl/forms/cb14hIenBnrL3uyB2

This group is created for ambitious, goal oriented women and also men who are big on supporting a woman's passion & goals. We welcome women from all walks of life/industries/career levels. We started this group because we are big believers in the quote " You can have everything you want in life if you just help enough people get what they want in life". We will put on events that facilitate an environment in which we can learn from each other and trade tips/skills for success. One woman's success can only help another woman's success, let's build each other up - together!

Below are the different ways to connect with the WSW organizers and members.  Please allow 24-48hours from submission for a response to your request.  If there is a option not brainstormed yet below, please don't hesitate to reach out to us and let us know your thoughts.

Request to be part of a Panel for a WSW event

https://goo.gl/forms/aMFwR1gZdr84bCQu1

Request to be a speaker for a WSW event

https://goo.gl/forms/wkAhHoq434sYXBpI2

Request WSW Promote your event

https://goo.gl/forms/y41tQTDTjBCekynz1

Request to Sponsor a WSW event

https://goo.gl/forms/WGFYpOGZ648YMr3s2

Request to Partner with WSW to create an event

https://goo.gl/forms/cb14hIenBnrL3uyB2

Request to Promote your company at a WSW event

https://goo.gl/forms/Thoobl78FxvEaDU22

name: Silicon Valley Women with Big Dreams
description: Calling all women with Big Dreams! Let's get together to inspire and support each other to go for our Big Dreams while rocking it as moms and/or partners. Let's watch our dreams take flight as our collective wisdom propels us to different heights. Be open to receive one million dollar gems to succeed in all areas of our lives: careers/business, relations, spirituality, and health. Together we can have it all!

name: Overwhelmed No More Bay Area Women's Entrepreneur Network
description:
Overwhelmed No More! Women's Network is an empowering community and sisterhood for women entrepreneurs, wearing many hats, juggling work, life, motherhood, business, relationships, and a never ending To Do List that keeps them up at night. 

Join us for our Womenpreneur Networking Socials and Workshops where you will learn tools to expand your business and get out of overwhelm-- connect with like-minded women to network, make new friends, and connections for your business. You're welcome to promote your business with a raffle prize! 

We start the Meetup with a dose of inspiration with original women's poetry from the book, "Overwhelmed No More! Love Yourself to Wealth"  http://alturl.com/magpd and meditation, creating a safe environment of support to grow ourselves and our businesses. After each poetry reading and workshop, open networking and connecting is available for women interested in getting to know each other better. 

It's always a FUN time and women get a lot from attending our events. Join us if you'd like to get out of overwhelm and you're looking for a dynamic women's group to grow yourself and your business. We're here to support you! =)

For more info. visit, www.Janna-Chin.com.

name: Goddess Painting Class
description: Paint your OWN sacred icon of the Divine Feminine, *even if you've NEVER painted before!* This class is a supportive, welcoming environment for artists and NON-artists alike to paint the Goddess in her many forms. Led by Katie Ketchum and Jennifer Mantle and based on Shiloh Sophia's Color of Woman method, we gather once a month to feed your spirit and guide you through creating a personal icon from beginning to end. The Color of Woman method was developed by Shiloh to enable you to create a painting you love without any prior knowledge or skill. Jennifer and Katie both thought they could never paint- and now not only teach but have had solo shows of their own work and routinely sell paintings! Classes take place in sacred space and begin with an opening and connecting to the Goddess we are working with that month, and then step-by-step instruction with live demo. This is a criticism-free zone. We are all about empowering and supporting each participant. Open to all, including men, GNC folks, kids, everyone. We also maintain an optional, private Facebook group that you're welcome to join upon taking a class. We would love to see you! Everything included in the class fee of $35, though if you wish to use a larger canvas than those we provide (which are typically around 9" x 11") and any favorite paints/brushes, feel free to do so. Kindly avoid the use of scented products.

name: San Francisco Bike Kitchen WTF (Women/Trans*/Femme) Meetup
description:
This group is for Women, Trans* and Femme folks interested in learning how to fix and maintain their bicycles. Bike Kitchen's WTF night provides a safe and supportive atmosphere for WTF folks of all skill levels to experiment and explore while learning bike mechanics and maintenance. 

WTF night is Every 2nd and 4th Monday of the month, from 6:00-9:00pm

Women Trans* Femme (WTF) hours are open to anyone who identifies as female, transgender, femme, genderqueer, trans-masculine, trans-feminine, or feels that their socialization or treatment as a woman, transperson*, femme has impeded their participation in bicycle mechanics.

name: Dream Priestess(TM) Circle - Bay Area Women
description:
The Dream Priestess(TM) Circle is a women's gathering where you can explore everyday magic. You will awaken and deepen your spiritual gifts (e.g. intuition), step into your spiritual power as a leader, and play with new ways of accessing spiritual guidance.

Whether you're experienced with your spiritual gifts, or just discovering you have them, join us for creative exploration and fun. 

The gatherings are at my home and there's room for about 10 women. 

About Amy Brucker

Amy is a Dream Priestess(TM) with an extensive background in shamanic healing and guidance, energy reading, dreamwork, creative expression, and business coaching. In her work, Amy uses her gifts as an intuitive empath to support strong, successful women who long to integrate their spiritual gifts into the full scope of their daily lives. She offers private mentoring programs as well as the Dream Priestess(TM) Initiation Program. She has a B.A. in art and an M.A. in spirituality, and was ordained as an interfaith minister. 

The Dream Priestess(TM) engages her spiritual power to dream her life into being. She knows that the more connected she is to her intuition, imagination, dreams, and nature, the more easily she can create magic for the benefit of herself and others. 

Personal Note: 

In the 15 years I've been teaching and mentoring, I've met many women who are intuitives, empaths, psychics, mediums, etc., but who keep this part of themselves secret so they can succeed in their careers or retain respect from their family and friends. 

These women often feel like they're leaving half of themselves locked in the closet, and consequently, they feel unfulfilled and alone despite their success. Yet more and more women are tired of hiding out. They're ready to confront their fears and be more open about who they are, and that's where I can help. When my clients work wit me, they begin to trust their gifts in bigger ways. They use their gifts to navigate their lives, relationships, health, businesses or careers. They feel more and more confident in who they are, and as a result, they begin to feel the deep soulful satisfaction that comes from living their true purpose.

To learn more go to www.amybrucker.com

name: "Just Talk it Out" (Vallejo Women's Support)
description:
Vent sessions are great and feel good. No denying that. How about "express vent sessions" with a purpose- where you actually walk away with useful wisdom nuggets and applicable tools from women of all walks and experiences? Women of Vallejo: If you need a lending ear, shoulder, or just want to be around positive energy in a judgment free, casual, uplifting setting, please join!

"Talk it out", get feedback, feel supported and go home feeling a little more diffused and balanced. We may not all have a support network that we can turn to help figure life out so voila folks! Sometimes, it just takes the right cocktail of feminine energy and to feel HEARD and acknowledged to be able to push through those roadblocks and clear out some of that internal clutter.
